item.text: a@#// rgya gar skad du/Aru su spyi ta ma ti de ba put+taM
pa 'i drits+tshenA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa lha'i
bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhuspa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo/ bam po dang po/// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i/dag slong
drug khri nyis stong deg 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa/ dgra bcom pa sha stag
dang 'jam dpal dang/ sangaga'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stongal/ byang chub sems
dpa' sams dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dung/ mthu chen thob dang/ spobs pa brtsag
dang/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal podang/ lhun po brtsigs dang/ lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rab tum sgul dang/
don rab soms dang/ legs par bsam pa sems dang/ sams dpa' ba dang/ sams kyi blo gros dang/ sims
bzang po dang/ nor bu brtsegs dang/ ri'ajoms rgyal po dang/ lag na rin po che dang/ sems dpa' rin po chadang/ lag
klu// na rin chen phyag rgya dang/ rtag tu lag btag dang/ rtag tu lag brkyang dang/ rtag tulag brtson dang/ sems can sgrol dang/ brtson
'grus mos dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa la gnas pa dang/ smon lam 'phags dang/ lag na sgron ma dang/ sems mnyam pa deng/ ngan song
srodang/ mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'dzoms pa dang/ brtson pa mi gtong dang/ nyima'i snying po dang/ rdo rje s rnam par gnon dang/ mtha' yas rnam par
gnon dang/ dpag med rnam par gnon dang// mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ blo gros dam pa dang/ khyad par blo gros dang/
blo gros 'phel dang/ 'gro grub dang/ sa 'dzin dang/ zla 'od dang/ zla ba'i tog dang/ 'od kyi tog dang/ 'od dpal dang/ snang ba thob pas rnam par gnon dang/
sang gi ltar rnam par gnon pas mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang// spobs pa thogs med dang/ spobs pa gzhad pa dang/ spobs pa dpa' ba dang/ rnam
tsa/ par gzhon dang/ nyi zla'i 'od ze mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang/dmigs med dang// blo gros dpe med dang/ rtag tu bzhad dgyes dbang po dang/ nor bu dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/

bud med rnam sgyur go cha dang/ rab tu snang ba dang/ rnam par snang byed dang/ mas byin dang/ tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po sgraskad zab mo dang/ de dag la

sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sam dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//rgyal po chen po bzhidang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ mimad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang de dag dang

gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs cig go lta bu blo gros rab gnas dang/ lha'i bu mchog 'brangs dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang/ de dag lasog ba thams cad

kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yong thabs cig go/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang/ lham yin gyi dbang po lcanubo dang/ de dag la sog pa

tham cad kyang byang chub samA dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhig pa'i lham yanagyo dbang po nyas khri dang yang thabacig go klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ de dag la sog pa thamA
cad kyang byang chub soms pa'i thig pa la yang dag pa gzhugs pa'iklu'i rgyal bo drug khri dang yang thabs cig go/dadag dang/ gzhan yang lha dang klu dang
[% ]@#// mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan cha dag dang yang thabs cig ste/ de nas bcom ldan/
'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskoracing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas khang na 'dug pa/ gtsagi pu dben pa ma 'dug
pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sams sad cing sa mas dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// donus 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting 'dzin de las langs so// 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bag tu med pa drug rnam pa drug tu rag tu
g.yos so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgyal brgya lam na sta'adi ltaste/dpar na u dum wa ra'i ma teka brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ba de
bzhin du/gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir/ zhib/ gsal ba/ brtag tu mad pa/ rtog ge dang bral 'a/ zab pa shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshe//
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mad nan chos mnyan pa'i ng ud do// chos mnyan pa mad
nan sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zad pa'i ng med pas/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/zhu ba zhus pajilta bu s
sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis ma khyab pa dag la nem nur
mad cing the tsam med par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sa mas can 'di dag ni/'dod chags che ba/
zhe sdang che ba/gti mug che ba/ dkar po'i chos dang bral la/ mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ glen pa/ blun pa/ mi gus pa/ sangs rgyas dang bral ba/ chos dang bral ba/ dge 'dun dang
bral ba sha stag yin pas/ ci nas kyang sems can 'dri dog gis chos thos nas/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyam mo// de nas yang 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis phyogs bcu'i byang chub sams dpa' gang dag da bzhanekashegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang/ gang dag zab mo'i
bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phragamang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas de'i tsho 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba/
dri ma med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snangab dri ma med pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thagatu/
de nas de'i mod la/ shar phyogs dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhong gang+ga'i klung gi bya ba'i bye ma snyad dag mnyan pa/ 'jam pa/ rnam par dag pa/ 'od gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ yongs su dag

pa'i 'od chen po dang/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// 'od de dang snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan/ 'jig rten kyi bar gyi mun pa mun nagadang/ ri'i rtse mo dang/ shing ljon pa dang/ dri dang/
khor yug dang/ btang zung dang/ btang thung chen po dang/ gangs dang/ ri rab dang/ lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad snang bachen pos gsal bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa da dka larang rang gi bsnyen bkur bdag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngonam mthong ma thos pa'i 'od
'di ltar yid du mchob/ 'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba 'di/ bcom ldan 'das rgyun gang lags/ rkyenani gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdago nug/
sems dang ba dang/ lus sim pa chen po dang ldan zhing/ sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ kati mug dag kyang kun tu mi 'byung lags na bcom ldan 'das gang grwa 'od 'ad ste/
bubaskye ba 'di su'i mthu lags/ 'di su'i byin kyi rlabs lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dug bsunapakur ba de dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur to// sangs

rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na lha'i sgra dang/ klu'i sgro dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang/ lha ma yin gyi sgra dang/ nam mkha' lding gi sgra dang/ dri za'i sgra dang/ mi 'am ci'i sgyu dang lto 'phya

chen po'its+tshe dang/ mi'i sgradang/ mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang/ bya'i sgra dang/ ri dgas kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma grags par gyurato// rlung gi sgra dang/ chu'i phung po'i sgra dang/ rgya mtsho
chen po'i shugs kyi sgra dang/ rol mo'i sgyudang/ glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur te/ 'ga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing/ thams cad zhi ba dang/ rab tu 'bar
gyur to// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dgal bsnyan bkur ba da dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skya bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde
bdang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skya bo phal po che'i donadang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gas 'od 'di lta bu bskye zhing/ des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od dag thams cad
snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i mthu lakas pa bshad du gsol/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag ke sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/
dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas gsung gi 'phrin las brjod de/ de bzhin gshags pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du gsung
zhing de dag gis gsung gi 'phrin las sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus pa da lta bu dus bsnyan bkur ba de dag la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gikasung brjod pa des sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i salasAn 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing/ rol mo'i sgrid kyang ma dkrol khar sgra grag par gyur to// rol mo'i

sgra de dag las mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sgo 'byung zhing/ stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang/ smon pa med pa'i sgra dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i

sgra dang/ rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang/ sbyin pa'i sgra dang/ tshul khrims kyis dang/ bzod pa'i sgra dang/
brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang/ bsam gtan gyi sgra dang/ shes rab kyi sgra dang/ des pa'i sgradang/ phan pa'i dngos po'i sgra dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' bdang/ btang snyoms

kyi sgra dgadang/ de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi sgo 'bum phrag du ma dag ki sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra byung ba de drag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpagacus grangs med pa dag bla
na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang/ nyan thos nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas nyide dang/ brgya byin nyid dang/ tshangs pa nyid dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su 'grub pa
las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsnyan bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas
khyed la ci zhig byas thong zhige/ 'od 'di ni ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs dang/ tshul khrims dang// bzhed pa dang/
brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs
las 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'od 'di na byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms
thams cad kyis yongs su bsgos pas/ yongs su tshim par byed pa ste/ 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa'i
mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de ltamod kyi/ 'onakyang legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung zhig dang/ khyed la bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag la bstan bkur bde dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to// skya bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skya bo mang po la bdeb dang/ byang chub sams drapa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi bstan bkur ba de dag la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yodadi/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgrwa bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/
rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bdabar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi sbyin pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldama'adas bzhugs
! rta 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gnas par 'dod chang/ sa dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug shesagazer ba'i sems can mi kus pa/ dbang po rtul ba/ ngo tsha shes pa dang
khral yod pa dang bralab/ nyon mongs pa can gyi las la spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyus te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mjed de na/ byang chub sems dpala'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba mthu cha ba/ shes pa che ba/ brtson 'grusache ba/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams yang dag par ston par byed pa/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzangs bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/
byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi pa'i 'apyad pa/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi sa'i go 'byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ chags pa med pa'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa// gzungs thob pa/ byang chub sems dapa' yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de/ 'di lta ste/
sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshes bsamagyis ma khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya
ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu ba zhu bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa des/ byang chub sems du pa'i gang dka chos bstan pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas
bsdu ba'i phyi 'od 'di bkye ste/ rigs kyi bu dag snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyun de yin/ rkyen nyid yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras
de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'odra 'delta bu 'gyed
lags/ bka' stsal pa// ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba dri mad bkod pa lta/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dating nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed do//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/ 'di ltar rnam par dag pa/ 'di ltar lus dangasams dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' khar
bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bu 'byed pa rami mdzod lags so// bka' stsal pa/ ragis kyi budakabyang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khaskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyiraro// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang+ga'i klung bya ba'i byamasnyad dag na/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhore re re nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der song ste/
lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong
a thos pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang/ snang ba 'di lta bu dang/ 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di degag las mchis/ su'i 'od lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug
pa des/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sams dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bkya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la
byang chub sams dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
thul del blta bar ng/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bstanubakur bgyi ba dang/ zhu ba dang/ zhu blagabagyi ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang/
[+ ]de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' drag kyang blta ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mamadzedader mchi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dusal da bab par shes na deng zhage/
denas de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phragabye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu mad grangasamad bsam gyis ma khyab pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'di
kha ltaste/ dper na mi stobs po tsho'i log la bskums pa las bskyang ba 'am/ bskyang ba las bskums pa tsam la/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi dedag nas mu snang ba gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mdzad 'dir lhags par gyur to// de na byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni me tog gi char dga mngon par rab tu 'babs shing/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
! par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so// la la dag ni phyi ma dang/ byug pa dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ spos kyi charadrag dang/ ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/
lho ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ a ti mug ta ka dang/ skya snar dang/ d+ha nu ska ri dang/ sna ma'i ma tog dang/ bAr shi ka dang/ bAr kika chen po dang/ maN+Da ra ba dang/
man+da ra ba chen po dang/ pA ru sha ka dang/ pA ru sha kachen po dang/ zla mdog dang/ zla mdog chen po dang/ zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char drag
dang sngo sakyi char dag rang/ 'phreng ba'i char dag dang/ phyi ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so// byang chub sams dpa' la la dag ni sale snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsal zhing/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba deralhags so// byang chub sams dpa' ladag ni de bzhanekashakas pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re ras kyang/ stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rtenakyi khams rnams su sgra skad kyis go bar byed cing lhags te/ de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bder lhags so// byang chub sams dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad 'arilhagasam thag tu/ danas du'i mod la 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'din sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can
gang dag ji snyad yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhibar gyur to// sa mas can gang la'ang 'dod chags kyikanod pa mad/ zhe stang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/
nga rgyal gyis ma yin/ phrag dog gso ma yin/ sor snas ma yin/ 'chab pasam yani/ khrobs ma yin/ yongs su gdung bas ma yin te/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sany+tsa
dang/ mchog tu dga' ba'i sa mas dang ldan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sams dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu mad grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa de
dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dkra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lanagasum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gi bar snang la lus
mi snang bar byas te/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ radarang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad+ma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag
du ma dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par gyur to/ 1/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srungasachen pos chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang/
ma tog gi char dang/ sposakyi char dang/ phyi ma'i char de dag dang/ sAl snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang/ snang ba chen po de'ang mthong/ glichen po bzhi pa'i 'jigartan gyi khams/
'di mi tog dag gse bus mo nub tsam du khabs par gyur ba'ang mthong/ 'khor phal po che lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dung/ mi ma yin pa dang/ dge slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dgakhasnyan dang/ dge bsnyan ma dedag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur
snang ba dag kyang mthong ng/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po stan las langs te/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'dras ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i
zhal// mi yi dmapa stobs bcu yon tan brgya dganges bsags pa// bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yadaganyes mun pa sel ba po// sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/
bskal pa khrag khrig phragabargyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad// bdagshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis// bzod stobs shin tu stobs dang ldan pa stobs
@#// bcu'i stobs ldan la// yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi tshom bsal du gsol// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang//
skyo zhing sbyong ba mi mnga' dbyas pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyas// sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang// sbyin dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi tho rtsom bsal du
gsol// khyod kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dusung chung stsal// katong la dbyas pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btung// thub pas zhal zas sbyang zhan de bzhin bo brang
dkor yang stsal// sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyod la zhu// stong pa'i chos rnams nges par bstan cing thugs la legs dgongs pas// rdul bral sku lus gtubs
kyang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing// gsungs shes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi// yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhupar 'tshal// 'dod chags zhe
sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la// bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// thugs rjebaskyod nas bskal pa brgya dag srid pa 'dir
spyad pa// dpa' bo lamarab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig/ bde gshags legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'o// dpa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul
zhabs dang ye shes brnyes// bdag dang sems can rnam par bshigatsang stong pa'i chos la brtson// shin tu dri ma mchis bsam bsgoms dag gi the tsomakhum// khyod kyis sngonan sbyin dang tshul
khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang// bsam gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bstan// khyod kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin// 'byung gnas
bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cage/ rdul bral khyod kyis sku las dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni// srang la gcal ba mdzad cing dam dumalhag rol ma lus par// sku kun
ril rgyas btang ste phug ron phrug gu gcige ma btang/ rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba thatsom gcad du gsol// lha tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo ga yos shing dgung na rdzobagyur la// lha
ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho las gyur cing// mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dokung zla dog sar lhung gyur kyang// rgyal ba grags pa mdzad pa khyod ni legapa'i tsheg ma gsung
de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig can du byung zhing/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gang ba 'di'i rgyun gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig byas
tha bzhi g/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyuran/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs
shing bslad par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshekas pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs pa'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bshad par bya'o// gnas
brtan 'od srungs chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyanupa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs 'din 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba dri mdabakodapa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung bya ba'i byam snyed dag 'od kyis snang
bar byas nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sams dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgi yang dag par baskulato/ 'jig rten gyi
khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dgashes dgazod pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/ pal lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gi bar snang la tal srid tsam na pad+ma dka la 'bod do// de nas
bcom ldan 'das la tshe dpaldan pa 'od srungasachen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' de dag kamathus ma tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dgarab tu bab cing//
spos kyi char dka dang/ phyi ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang mdakrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs
dad pa zhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus ma tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu babacinge/ spos kyi char dag dang/ phyi ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/ sal snyan 'bum ldug
mang po dag kyang ma dkrolo bar sgra 'byin to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dren byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang me gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de dag ni

nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'od srungs 'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po gong dang/ byams
pa chen po gang dang/ phan par 'dod pa gangadang/ spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam
gtanadang/ shes rab gang la gnas pa de la mi gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de la'ang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro// 'od srungs kyang
chub sams dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyus ngag gis lta bar mi nus te/ de
bzhinugshegs pa rnams kyis gzugasapa khanor zad do// 'od srungs rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ thegapa lakasar du zhugs pa'i byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang re zhig mi mthong na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom

ldan 'angs latshodang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dgadang/ spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/byang chub sems
dpa'i ting nga'adzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur to/ bcu gang zhan/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang/
snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing/ de la rlom sems med pa dang/ nyon
thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmags pa med cing/ de las ye shes yongs su tshol pa dang/ lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong n/ dngos po gzhan dag lta ci smos te/ bdog pa
thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang/ tshogs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cang/ tshogs des rlom sams mad pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/
bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dpag tu mad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang/ bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
la bkod nas/ phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang/ byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/ 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po padag dang ldan na//
byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'de skad
cos gsol to// bcom ldan 'dos ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas naam yang sams 'ga' yang mkhaskyad pa'i legs
par gsungs pa gsung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la'ang dgod par bgyi na/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos kyang ci'atshal lags/ bcom ldan 'drasakyis bka' stsal pa// 'od srungasade lta bsan nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyisan/ lus thams cad rnam par 'jig
pa'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi nus te/ ting 'dzin de'i mang yang mi shesan/ snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de na gnas mad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' di dag blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhan/ bcom
ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa lta bu de dag mthong bar dka'aba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du khyodar zhig sdod cig
dang dunas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting 'dzin de las sdang zhing/ de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'od srungs de ltamod kyi/ khyod nyid te ngo'adzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis/
byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bu s gnas pa rtogs shaki/ danas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyaltar mnyan nas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
0 spyod lam ji lta bu s gnas pa lta ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shang rnam par langs kyang de dka ma mthong
ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dgage 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'ang ma shes/ de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa'i ng ma shes/ ci byed pa dang/ ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du ma shes/
ma mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ting 'dzin nye khre la snyoms par zhugs kyang/
byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bdabar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag
da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par/ de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na/ byang chub sams dpa' gang dag phyams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag
lta smos kyang ci'atshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mosu zhigAkha na med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'dras kal te
byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'ad nyod kyi slad du go cha'atshal bar bgyid pa de ni gi cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni sud kyis kyang
yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi sa'ang ma yanen/ sems can gazhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam dusams te/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi
mchog tu bstan pa yin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lamadzalte bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan shAri'i bu byang chub semyu
dpa' dedag blta ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing/ rnam par langs kyang de dag gi mtshan ma'angashes par ma nus so// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor
'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnasabartan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' du dug blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu
dang rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin pa zhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing/ rnam par langs kyang/ de dag gi 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'ang ma shes/ 'greng ba'ang ma mthong/ 'chaka pa'i ng
ma mthong/ 'dug pa'i ng ma mthong/ nyal ba'ang ma mthong ste/ de dag blta bar ma nus so// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/ bdag zheba'i ting nge 'dzin
rnams thob pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bo che'i sbyabs kacig tu gyuracing/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
cig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubasagacig tu gyur la/ der mi la la zhig skyas nas/ des ra reb tsamagyi rdza shing thogasati/ bdag tang nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tumadun du
mchis na// sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par snga bo chedi gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i sad

du/ de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i tang nga 'dzin rnams thob pa la re zhig bskal ba 'das par gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du'ang grag par ma 'gyuran/
des teng nge 'dzin de las slong ba lta smos kyang ci 'chil te/ de ni konus ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs bam mams par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan 'ang/ ye shes de
lta bu dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' de dgabalta ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing/ rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong// da dkakakanas kyang ma 'tshal lakra
so// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes de lta bu yongs su tshol ban/ sems can re re'i slad du bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi phyi ma sudadu/
sems can dmyal ba chen por srog par gyur kyang spro bar bgyi zhing/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su gtang par ma 'gyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni/ bdag sladu ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar skyod cing/ de lta bu'i theg pa chen
bo'ang yongs su slong bar mi bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu s tshig de skad
smras pa legs so lags so// rab 'byor khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma gyur tu zinan/ khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid

gang+gA'akrung gaphyi ma snyad byed du 'jugacung/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
kyi khams kyi sems can ji snyad pa de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nan gyi
! dper byas te/ gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang/ shA ri'i bu dang/ 'od srungs chen po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur la/ rab 'byor nyan thos
chen po de lta bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba phrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyire zhin/ la 'byor nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ni nyen thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin
no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skyo dag rnams las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyas so// de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnus de nyid na'adug pa 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyis/ bdagagis lha 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang
bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyurapas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya pa mngon par 'dus byas na/ 'di ltar 'gyur ba'irdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya
ba mngon par 'du byas zhas/ pad+mashing rta' phang lo tsam/ 'dab ma na gsar/ sdong bu ni dngul/ snying po ni rin po che dpalakyi snying po/ zakha ni baiDUrma las byas pa bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprulacing/ par de dag la byang chub sems dpa'ilus gser gyi kha dog lta bu/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpal dang
ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ 'od gsal ba dag pa pa'i snying po dag gi dbus na skyil mo krung gas 'dug pa'i lus kazugs drug kyang mngon par stsal to// de nas pad+ma de
dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung sta/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ chos []ris dang/ rmongs
'khor dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs chen dang/ 'od chung dang/ tshad mad 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang/ tshad mdadagadrang/ dge rgyus dang/ sngon med dang/
bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che dang/ mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ gya nom snangab dang/ shan tu mthong dang/ 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar dang/ de bzhin du stong gsum kyi stong
chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris ther 'bum nas/ 'og min kyi lha'i ris kyi bar gyi 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas ji snyed pa thams
cad du 'dong zhing/ sgra sgrogs par byed/ dbyangs rjod par byed/ yang dag par skul bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di na rnam par rgyu ba'i che tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams// 'jig rten du ni lan 'ga' 'byung// u dum wa ra'i me tog ltar// sangs
rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon// shAkya seng ge ma yi mchoka/ de ni 'jig rten 'dir byung ste// sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed pa'i// chos ni yang dag pa ston mdzad// lha yi 'dod pa yid dga'
la/ ji srid yun ring spyad byas la// gang du tshor ba myong 'gyur ba'i// ngan song rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// ji srid 'dod pa rnams bstan pa// srid pa phyir zhing rab tu 'phel// khams gsum 'khor
ba'i srog chags la// bde ba yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkonadang// khom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni// gang dag bag med mi rtogs pa// de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur// sangs
rgyus blta ba'i phyir dpal// chos kyi dam pa mnyan par gyis// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'dusa'og tu// phyis dus 'gyod par ma byed cig/ mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing// 'jogs chen bdud
kyi zhags pa yi// bag mar spyod pa byed rnams la// thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur// da ni 'di skadas bar pya// bsod nams byas pa'i sems can gang// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i//
rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur phrad byos// kang dgakhyams pa bsam yas pa'i// 'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med// dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod
[]// ma yin// skyob pa shAkya sang ke yis// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa bye bar spyod mdzad nas// ye shes dmapa b.ros nas ni// gapal sems can
mi dmigs shing// srog dang gang zag yodaman pa'i// chos mchog zhib zab mo dang// mthong bar dka' ba rab tu ston// rtag pa dang ni de bzhin du// chad pa'i ng rab tu sbyangs rgyur cing//mchin
ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos// srog chags rnams la ston par mdzad// gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i// stong nyid mtshan ma chad pa dang// smon par byed pa ma yin pa'i/ yang dag mtha'
ni rab tu ston// rtags mad mtshan ma yod min zhing// skya mang 'byung ba med pa dang// 'ong ba med cing 'gro med pa'i// chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad// zad mad 'byung ba yong min zhing//
nga bzhin kyis nadas med dang// bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa// ston kyang rlom pa'i sems mi mar// sems can gang yang skye mad cing// 'ga' yapa'i chib yod ma yin// mya ngan 'das pa'i ng
gang yang med// sems can 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin// skad kyis chos rnams bstan byas kyang// skad la stan pa yod yin zhing/ yig rnams dang bral ba'i chos// mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad/
gang la rlung ni ma kAnas shing// chu dang me yang mi dmaches la// sar yang rtogs pa med pa'i chos// spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad// gzugs dang tshorab 'du shes dang// 'du byed rnams

dang rnam shes ni// stong zhing phung po lnga po dka/ dngos po med par ston par mdzad// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin med// rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang// stong pa de yang/
dmigs su med// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang// ro dang reg bya yid 'ong ba// de dag rnam par rtog pas sbyong/ rtog pa'i ng rang bzhin stong pa yin// de ltar sangs rgyas skyob pa ni// srog
chogs rnams la chos ston kyi// gang dag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa// de dag rnam 'dren drung du sheg/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa de dag gis stong gsum kyi steng chen po'i
'jig rtan kyi khams 'dir tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis chos bstan pas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'ilha'i bu rnams las lho bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos rnams
la chos kyi mgo rdul mad cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgako/ lha'i bu khri nyis stong gisani 'dod chags dang bral ba rjesasu thob bo// lha'i bu sa a phrug gsum dang nyis 'bum byang chub tu
sams sa so// byang chub sams dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa lha'i bu khris ni mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs
de dag gis lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul bde dag las/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dgoskad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
ta/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ lha'i martog ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ maN+Da ra ba dang/ mnar ba chen po dang
bya ma dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dag gis de bzhinagshegs pa la mngon par gtor to// stong gi bar snang la'ang lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dka rab tu len par gyur to// de'i tshe na gling
chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che la gzi brjid cha'adug gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtes tsam yang mad pa de sud
kyi lha'i bu dag 'dus par gyur cing/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang ma tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu blo shes rab
gnas dang/ lha'i bu mtshams bzangs dang/ lha'i bu dri mad dang/ lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
! la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gse yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas ga la ba der deng ste lhags nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ me tog man+dar pa'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// ma tog mnar ba'i char de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas su/
ma tog gi phung po 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa kun nas gnas par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs ji lta bu byin kyis brlabs na/ 'di lto khur 'gyur pa'i
byen gyi rlabs byin gyis brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigartan gyi khams 'di'i steng gi bar snang la ma tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to// sa tog gi 'od ngas stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas nas byung sta/ smon lam lan byung ba'i stan la 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab
gnas kyis 'jam dpa la kazhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so// lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal kazhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so//
!/ bam po gnyis pa// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te// bcom ldan 'das kyi na sngar bdag su dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par
bya/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ shes par dka' ba'i gzhi rnams dang/ gnas mad pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ smos pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ spros pa dang bral ba'ig zhi rnams
[]// dang/ brjod du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ bstan du med pa'ikazhi rnams dang/ zab mo'i gzhi rnams dang/ bden pa'i gzhi rnams rang/ chags pa med pa'i gzhi/
rnams dang/ mi phyed pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi rnams dang smon pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang/
yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi rnams dang/ mtshungs pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ srung ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ dor ba med pa'i kazhi rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
gzhi rnams dang/ chos kyi gzhi rnams dang/ dge 'dunakyi gzhi rnams dang/ ya shas yongs su rdzogasapa 'thol ba'i gzhi rnams dang/ khams gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang/ chos thams
cad mi dmigs pa'i zo/zhi rnams dang/ chos thams cad skya ba mad par bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang/ sang+ga'i gzhi rnams dang/ dpa' bo'i gzhi rnams dang/ gzhu mad pa'i kazhe de dag bstan pa/
snod du 'gyur ba na su yod snyam mo// de nas ya'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sams te/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par byab byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa
go sa pachod pa'i sbobs pa dang ldan pa yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya'o snyam mo/// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon

ma nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad cesastsas so// lha'i bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kho bo dang lhan/
cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad cas smras so// 'jam dpal gal te khyod
gsung bar mi mdzad/ rjod par mi mdzad/ 'don par yang mi mdzad/ yi ge'ang ma mdzad// sgru'ang ma gsan pa lta na/ bdag gis de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
lha'i bu gal te khyod nyan par mi byed/ 'dzin par mi byed/ 'chang bar mi byed/ kun chub par mi byed/ sams par mi byed/ reg par mi byed/ rnam par rig par me byad/ len par mi byed/

gtong bar ma byed cang/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed pa lta na/ kho bos kyang de bzhin bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'abu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge mang pa/ sems
med pa/ sems dang bral ba ste/ gang gse ming brjod cing/ ming de'ang g.yo ba med pa'i phyirero// lha'i 'us smras pa/ 'jam dpal lha'i bu 'di dag ni khyod las chos bstan pa nyan par 'tshal gyi/
sa phyogs 'di nyid du khyod kyis lha'i bu 'di dag la chos kyi bka' mchid gsungs shika/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni nyan par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de/
'dzin par 'dod pa rnams la'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyirezhe na/ lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin n nyan 'dod par 'gyur la/ sems can du 'dzin pa dang/ srog tu 'dzin
pa dang/ gang zag tu 'dzin n nyan 'dod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di na ston par byed pa'o// bdakan nyan pa'o//
'di ni bshad par bya ba'o snyam du sems pas/ de ni chags pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa dang/ sems can du dmigs pa dang/ chos su
dmigs pa'o// lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yare 'dzin pa mad pa de na 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas chos ston par byed de/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ sums par mi byed/
rlom sems su mi byed do// de la 'khor gsum yongs su dka pa gang zhen/ bdag tu dmags pa med cing/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sams su mi byed/ sems par mi byed pa
dang chos smakhar dmigs la mad cing/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ rlom sems su ma byed/ sems par mi byed pa dang/ chos su dmigs pa med cing/ rnam par rtog par mi byed//
rlomasams su mi byed/ sams par mi byed pa ste/ lha'i bu gang dag de ltar nyan pa de dag ni mnyam par nyan pa yin te/ mi mnyam par ma yin no// lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis
smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci nas kyang mi ldog pa nyid kyi slad du bstan pa bshad pa legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ci rung rnam par ma rtog cig/ byang chub
sems dpa' gang ldog pa de ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang las ldog/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/
lha'i bu 'dod chags las ldog ge/ zhe stang las ldeg ge/ gte skug las ldog go/ srid pa las ldeg go/ ma rig pa las ldog go/ 'khor bar sku pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi bar las ldog ko/ rgya las
ldog go/ lta ba las ldogago/ mnge las ldog ke/ gzugs las ldog go/ 'dod pa'i khams las ldog go/ gzugasakyi khams las lngago de/ gzugs med pa'i khams las ldog go/ nyan thos
kyi spyod pa las ldog ge/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las ldeg go/ rtog pa las ldog go/ 'dzin pa las ldog ko mtshan ma las ldog ge/ dngos por 'dzin pa las ldogako/ chad par lta ba las
ldog go// rtag par lta ba las ldog ko/ blang ba las ldog go/ der ba las ldog go/ bdag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ sems can du 'du shes pa las ldog go/ srog tu 'du shes palasaldeg go/
gang zag tu 'du shes pa las ldog go/ yid la byed pa dag las ldog go/ chags pa dag las ldog ke/ phyin ci log dag las ldog go/ 'jigs chogs las ldog ko/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba
las ldog go/ 'jigs tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las ldog go/ sgrib pa dag las ldog go/ phung po lngar 'dzin pa dag las ldog ko//
dang nang gi skya mchod thams cad las ldog ko/ khams rnams las ldog go/sangs rgyas 'du shes pa las ldog ko/ chos su 'du shes pa las ldog go/ dge 'dun du 'du shes pa las ldog ko/
bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdaka chos ston par 'gyur ro// bdag mas can grol bar byed par 'gyur ro// bdag bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro// bdag ye shes thob par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i 'du
shes de dag las ldog ge/ de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bcu la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par mi byed do// dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/
mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do// mtshan ma rnams la rtog par mi byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par byed do// nyan shes kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rteko
par mi byed cing/ rtog pa thams cad las ldog ste/ lha'abud ltar byang chub sems dpa' kang de las ldog pa de nimi ldog pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal gang las ma regro/ 'jam
dpal kyis smas pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yo shes las mi ldog ke/ stong pa nyidi las ma ldog ko/ mtshan ma med pa las ma ldegago/ smon pa med pa las mi ldog go/ de bzhin nyid las mi ldog ge/
ba chos kyi dbyings las ma ldeg ke/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las a ldeg go/ mnyam pa nyid las mi ldeg ko/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa dang/
rnam par rtog pa dang/ yangs su rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa de ni dus na ldog pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsung ba de ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma mchis pa
zhika gam/ 'on tamachis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig gam/ 'on te mchis pa'i ng ma lags/ ma mchis pa'i ng ma lags pa zhig lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag las ldog
pa'i tshes de dag ni yod pa'i ng ma yin/ mad pa'i ng ma yin/ yod pa dang 'dra pa'i ng ma yin/ yod pa'i ng ma yin/ med pa'i ng ma yin pa'i ng ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam rupal
'on gang las ldog/ 'dzamadapal gyis smas pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang/ legs pa ma yin pa'i dzin pa dang/ ldog par 'dzin pa gang yin pa du 'dzin par mi byed/
yongs su gtong bar mi byed/ mtshan mar 'byed pa po'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de na yod par yang bstan par mi bya/ med par yang bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kal te yong
pa dang med pa las ldog par gyuran/ de ni skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gal te yod pa las ldog par gyur na/ rtag par 'gyur la/ med pa las ldog par gyur na/chad
par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pani rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi chos bstan pa nirtag pa'i/
phyir yang ma yin/ chadapa'i phyir yang ma yin no// lha'i bu du bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung par gyur pa'ozhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongs su shes par zad kyi/ de la ni chad
pa'i ng mad/ rtag pa'i ng mad da/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldeg pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu khris mi skya pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
da nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/
bstan bkur bgyi ba dang/ zhu ba dang/ zhu thug bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyis gshegs so// 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par
rtog pa la ma spyod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin te// lce'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/
lha'i bu de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi gda' 'o// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gal te khyod kyis thams cang mthong na/
ma/ des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpalaci'i slad du de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de na khe bos blangs zin te/ de ni kho bo'i mdunan/
bzhugs so zhes gsungs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji sum ru sa mas/ kho bo mdun zhes bya bcu zhig yin snyam/ lha'i bus sas pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i
khams lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i khams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rngams cadunam
mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' ji lta bu yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng de lta bu yin pas/ nam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med pa 'i
phyir ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod na/ ma la 'di khong du chud par bya zhing/ cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o// de nas yang
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ khang pa brtsokas pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka pa bzhi pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu 'byes pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa sum khri nyis stong mngon par
sprul to//khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po cha'i khri ston lha'i dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i shes kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing/ khri stan re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' lus gzugs
skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dka stsal to// de nas 'jam dpala gzhon nur gyur pas ji lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di lta bur
'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs byin gyis brlabs pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par spyod pa'i pad+ma gang dug yin pa de dag dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa da dgang/
bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ stong gi bar snapal bcom ldan 'dus kyi 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing/ phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khor bar 'khod do// de nas pad+ma de dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sams dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang/
khong pa brtsigs pa dag nu 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyangs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
bstan do// gang+ga'i bye snyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas bya ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod// byang chub mchog gi spyad pa stsal mdzad pas// de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes
pa lags// thub pa mtshan gyis yongs su spras gyur pa// sku mchog srid pa gsum n lha nga ste// 'dren pa gangal mang dang srog dang ni// gang thag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston// rnamapar
'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad// bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bstan// khyod kyi shes rab srid gsum thogs mi mnga'// se shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshal
lo// gang zhig chos rje lha drang mas mchod pa'i// 'jig rten 'drenapa la ni 'dun 'gyur zhing// stong pa nyid la mos par bgyi ba yi// mi de 'jig rten dka ki 'dren par 'gyur//
gang dag sngon byung du bzhen shags pa dang// gang dag phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dran pa dag// de dag gisanamtshan mad stong pa'i chos// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgom/
'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni// skye dang 'chi ba dmigs su ma mchis shing// 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te// chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no// ji ltar
ma yas sgyu ma bstan gyur pa// snang yang de bzhin nyade dum mchis ltar// d bzhi ni chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang// rmi lam lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan// gang zag la las
gang+ga'i bye snyad kyi// 'jig rten khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin byin pas// 'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa/ bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags/ byang chub
'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yis// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'ibyi stod du// ma tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag/ phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bas// gang gis gang
la mi dang srog dang ni// gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag/ thos nas de la 'od gsal bzod thob pa// de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags// gang
la mang dang gang zag 'du shes mchis// bskal pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang// shing rta dbung chung khri stan sbyin bgyis kyang// nges 'gro ba grol ba mi 'thob bo// mi mchog gang dag mya ngan
'das pa dang// de dag gis kyang sems can ma bkrol ba// mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yi// chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol// sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du
gnas pa dang// de bzhin bstan la dad pa thob par dka'// ma mo srid pa'i ng rnyed par dka' bas na// rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la lags brtson gyis// mi khom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs
shing// khom ba phun sum rnyed dka' thob gyur la// bde gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyis ragis pa'i rnal 'byor spyod// sa la 'chol zhung 'dug par ma byed
par 3chos thes gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis// khyed kyis rtag tu dkon pa'i kaMnas stanal// des ni mi rnams dam papa'i gyur bar byos// chos sna'i dge bshes gang yane stan gyis
la sngago pa'i grogs 'ga' yang ma ston cig/ sems can kun la sems na mnyam gyis la// sems can de la nam yang ma rlom zhen/ tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos kyis
la/ rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod// g.yel ba med par shing drung snyan gyis la/ pakus te bor ba mchog la ma smodacig/ 'dus byas 'di dag rdams cad 'dus byas min//
mtshan nyid gtsag cing smig rgyu 'dra ba yis// dam pa'i den gyi mu gcig shes kyis la// myur dug zhal yas byang chub reg par gyis// phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos// nang gi skye mched
drug dang phyi yi drug/ de dag grong stong 'dra bar gasungs pas na// de la nam yang rten par ma byed cig/ 'dod chags zhasdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid// gti mug nga rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyad//
rtog pad yangs byunga'abyung med par/ de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur// de nas sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bu na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyas so// dge slong lnga brgyanalen pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong sum brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyim/

rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mag rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam dag go/ dragebasnyan badun stong dang// dge bsnyan ma stong

dang [0f10 ]lha'i bu nyi khri bdun stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi ag rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas n ma skya pa'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// stong gsum
[ ]kyi stongan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tugayos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu/
[M/ ]'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go de nas bcom ldan 'dus la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis stong
gsum kyi steng chen po'i 'dzag rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tukayos pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus kazugs pad+ma dag dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa 'di dug na mchis pa 'di rnams chos
zab mo 'di lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang/ 'khor 'di'ang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang/ lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyad 'dus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di
dag su'i u thu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shAri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shAri'i bu 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
mthu yin te/ des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu snang ngo// de ci'i phyire zhen/ nA ri'i bu 'di ltar dang de bzhin gshegs pa la/ 'jam dwapal gzhonanur gyur pa/ lha'i bu blo gros rab
gnas dang lhan tsaki tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs subasgrub pa'i phyir/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhu
ba zhing/ zhuT+Tag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'dzin mi gda' 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod re zhig sdong cag dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de de'u re bdud
kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad zil gyis gnos cing/ bkod pa chen pos de bzhan gshegs pa ga la ba der 'ong bar 'gyur ro/
denas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'dzage par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ da nas de'i med la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams
'di na bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya phrag rje snyad pa de dag thams cad mog mog por gyur to// bdud sngagican de dag kyang rang rang gi lus rgas shing gtugs la 'khokas par gyur nas/ lag pa 'kha
ba la rten cing 'gro kharagyur to// de dag ni lha'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur pa dang/ rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang brnyings shang rab tu 'jigs mun pa mun
nag tu gyur par mthong ngo// de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cing sngangs la yi chad cing skyid lug lta/ spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du rnam par
rtogasta/ gang gis bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'du lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/ rkyen ni gang yan bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho zhingamad ba 'am/ cig tu me'agyur
grang snyam mo// bdud de dag gi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de skyes ya phrag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu sprul pa ther 'bum sprul te/ bdud de dag gi mdun du bkod do//
de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dgal 'di skud ces smras so// grogs po dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpo' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba de da
ltar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mthu yin te/ khyed la 'tshe ba 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyiso/
ma skrag cig/ lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis chog de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdago can de dag kasi sgra de'ang thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas/ yang
rgya cher sngangs shing skrag ste/ bdud kyi gnas de dag thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so// de nas bdud sdig can de dag kas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po ngag
[4]/ yongs su skyobs shig/ grogs lo dag yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gas bdud sdig can de dag la 'daskad ces smras so// grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/
grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ khyed cag dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zla la ba der song zhu dpa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems canu 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad do// de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras
nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bdud sdako can 'bum phrag ther 'bum du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rgas shing gatugs la 'khogs shing lag pa
'khar ba la rtan bzhin du 'dong zhung skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la
ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thams cad kyis sgra skad mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag las
yongs su bskyab tu gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa ni mo sngo lags kyi/ 'jam
[]// dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcika lu'i mang ni de lta ma lags so// de ci'i slad zhen/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mang thos nas bdag cag 'jigs shing sngas la skrag
par gyur te/ 'chi 'pho ba snyam du 'tshal cing/ ma mchis par 'gyur pa snyam du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sduge can de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
bdud sdeg can dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhinate/ ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su sminapa dang/ rnam par dbye ba mad par sems can rnams kyi don byas pa dang/
byed par 'gyur bde ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don ma mdzad mi mdzad pas/ de'i phyir ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kacig pu'i ming yongs su
bsgrags pa de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pas ni/ khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnam par 'jog par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can de
dag kes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di ltar lus 'khogs pa 'drasi nyam thagacing ngo tsha lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag cag gi kha dog rgyas par
gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma 'ongs kyi bar du re zhig 'de nyid du sdod cige dang/
des khyed cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pating nge 'dzin de las langs te/ stan las langs
nas/ byang chub soms dpal 'bum phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang/ glu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' ldinge dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag rab tu gsal zhing/ ma tog ut+pa lo dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma
dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'bebs pa sha stag gse yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa chen po dang/ rnam par rtse bachen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgopos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug// danas bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par 'jug gam/ 'jam dpol gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyoms par 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin
[7] ]@#// bsgrub pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang las thos/ khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs nas ni ji srid cig na/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
[H ]gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos shing/ bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i tshan pa rtsom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu thugs bskyed par yang ma gyur lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gangalas ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci/ 'jam dpal kyis gsol pa/ bcom
blo ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam []gyis ma khyab pa/ grangs ma mchis pa'i sang ches grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/
de bzhin gshegs pa ma tog mnar ba'i dri zhes bgyi ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ bru namad pa/
lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasabyung ste/ de ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de gsung bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de las bdag gis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams
cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal bsgrub pade dag gang yane/ 'jam dpal gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu dang ldan na bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jag par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ nyi shu gang zhen//
bcom ldan 'das 'di la bya chub sems dpa' 'dod chags rnam par 'jog cing/ 'dod chags kyi sam sa rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ zhe sdang rnam par 'jig cing/ zhi
sdang ge sems rnam par 'dzagi par bgyid pa dang/ gti mug rnam par 'jigacing/ gti mug gisams rnam bar 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ phrag dog rnam par 'jig cing/ phraka
dgage sams rnam par 'jag par bgyid pa dang/ nga rgyal rnam pa 'jig cing/ nga rgyal gyi sams rnam par 'dzag par bskyed pa dang/ 'chab pa rnam par 'jog cing/ 'chapa
pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ khro ba rnam par 'jig cing/ khro ba'i sems rnam par 'jagi par bgyid pa dang/ yongs su gdung ba rnam par 'jog cing/ yongs
su gdung ba'i sams rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ 'du shes rnam par 'jog cing/ 'du shesakyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ lta ba rnam par 'jagicing/
lta ba'i sams rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ rtog pa rnam par 'jig cing/ rtog pa'i sams rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ lenal rnam par 'dzikacing/ len pa'i sam
bu/ @#// rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ 'dzin pa rnam par 'jig cing/ 'dzin pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ mtshan ma rnam par 'jig cing/
mtshan ma'i sams rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ srid pa rnam par 'jig cing/ srid pa'i sams rnam par 'jige par bgyid pa dang/ rtag pa rnam par 'jig cing/ rtag
pa'i sams rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ chad pa rnam par 'jig rung/ rmad pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ phung po rnam par 'jig cung/ phung po'i
sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ khams rnam par 'jagacing/ khams kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ skye mched rnam par 'jig cing/ skye mched kyi sems
rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang/ khams gsum pa rnam par 'ajag rung/ khams gsum pa la dmigs pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyedapa sta/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sams dupa'i rnam pa nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ngo
bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzan de 'thob bo//
[d/ ]chu ba sams dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhidang ldan n ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste//
bzhi gang zhen/ slu ba ma mchis pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gis dam 'cha' ba dang/ 'du shes kyi dbang gi spyod yul ma lags pa dang/ chos thams cad ma 'dzin pa ste/ bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n ting nge 'dzin du 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob
sta bzhi krung zhin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang/ sdig pa'i grogs po skyong ba dang/ sbyangs pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ yo byad bsrungs pa dang ldan pa dang/
'du 'dzi ma mchis par spyod pa sta/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' chos bzhi po dag dang ldan n ting nge 'dzand thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
sams dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob sta/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims ma ral ba dang/ tshul khrims min pa dang/ tshul khrames
nag nog ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos
khazhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la lhag par mi dmags pa dang/
bzod pa la gnas pa dang/ sems can pa rlom sems ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n tipeng 'dzin du 'thob bo/
bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob sta[ ]/ bzhi gang zhen/ stong pa nyid kyi chos sgom zhing/ gang zag la rtsom sams ma mchis pa
dang/ mtshan ma mchis pa sgom zhing/ mtshan ma yongs su sbyong ba dang/ son pa ma mchis pa sgom zhing/ smon pa'i sams yongs su slong ba dang/ chog 'tshal zhing dngos po
thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang bzhi sta/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' rnam pa de dag drung/ chos de dgadang ldan n bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed
pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshakas pa ma tog man+dA ra ba'i dris ting pa'i dzin bsgrub pa de rab tu bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin
gshegs pa de las ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos shing/ bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mnar ba'i dri de'i 'og tu/ da bzhin gshegs pa dgrakhacom pa yang dag par/
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu dang/ rin po che dang/ glog dang/ nyi zla thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba byung bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so// bstan pa 'du pe shad pan/ 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' khris ni ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so/
de nas bcom ldan 'dos la gnas brtan shAri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ci tsam du tupenge 'dzin du legs par bsgrubs shing/
tingeng 'dzin de legs par bsgrubs pas/ bdud sdig can 'di dgamisdugapa'i rnam pa 'di lta bur bgyes pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'dras kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shAri'i bu 'di jo snyam du sems/ stongagasum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'de 'ba' zhig gi
bdud sdig can 'di dag 'di dag 'di ltar mi sdug pa'i rnam par byas so snyam na/ shAri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar m blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa'i byan gyis brlabs kyis phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhingagang+gA'i klung gi byamasnyadangag na/ bdud sdig can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur
dpa'i phyir ro/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs 'dri thengal/
ci nas kyang bdud sdegacan 'di dag sngon gyi kha dog rgyus pa dang ldan pa 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis brlabs drab tang ngo//byin gyis brlabs de btang
ma thog tu/ de nas bdud sdeg can de dag sngon gyi kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sa/ bdud sdig can de dag dang/ bdud kyi dkyil
'khor de dag la sbas pa/ sdekacan dag gang la mig dang/ gang la migage 'dushes dang/ gang la mig tu lhag par 'dzin pa dang/ gang la mig gi ma chen ma drang/ gang la mig tu lhag par dmigs pa
dang/ gang la mag tu mngon par chags pa dang/ gang la mgigi rlom sams dang/ gang lamig bdag gir 'dzin pa dang/ gang la mgagi rtan dang/ gangalamagel mngon par zhan pa dang/ gang la mge

gi sbos pa dang/ gangalamag nga'i ba nyid dang/ gang lamig kun tu srung ba dang/ kAngal mig bsgom pa dang/ gang la meg blang ba dang/ gang la migader ba dang/ gang la mag tu rtog pa dang/ gang la mig tusatshig

ba dang/ gang la mig yongs su 'grub pa dang/ gang la mge 'gog pa dang/ gang la mig skye ba dang/ galamig tu 'dzin pa dang/ gangal mag 'ong ba yod pa de lani/ khyod bdud kyi las bar chad byadapa'i yu la yod
0 do// sdake can dag de bzhin du gang larnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ reg khyadang/ chos dang/ gang la chos kyi 'du shes dang/ gangal/
chos su lhag par 'dzin pa dang/ gung la chos kyi mtshan ma dang/ gang la chos su lhag par dmags pa dang/ gang la chos su mngon par chags pa dang/ gangal chos kyi rlom samasadang/ gapal chos bdag

ga 'jin pa dang/ gang la chos kyi rten dang/ gangal chos la mngon par zhen pa dang/ gang la chos kyi spros pa dang/ gang la chos nga'i ba nyid dang/ gang la chos kun tu srung ba dang/ gang la chos bsgom

pa dang/ gang la chos byung ba dang/ gangal chos dor ba dang/ gang la chos su rtog pa dang/ gang la chos su sems pa dang/ gangal chos yongs su 'grub pa dang/ gang la chos 'gog pa dang/ gang la chos skya

ba dang/ gang 'chos su 'dzin pa dang/ gapal chos 'angab yod pa de la ni khyod bdud kyi las bar chad byed pa'i yul yodado// sdig can dag gang lamig med pa dang/ gang lamag gi 'du shes mad pa dang/ gang
la ma tu lhag par 'dzin pa mad pa dang/ gangal meg ge mtshan ma med pa dang/ gang la mig tu lhag par dmigs pa med pa dang/ gangal ma/tu mngon par chags pa yodapa dang/ gang la mgo ka rlom sems med pa

dang/ gang la mgo bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa dang/ gang la mag gi rtenamad pa dang/ gang la mgo la mngon par zhen par med pa dang/ gang la mgo ki spros pa med pa dang/ gang la mgi nga' ba nyade med pa dang/
gang la meg kun tu srung ba mad pa dang/ gang la meka bsgom pa med pa dang/ gang la mag klung ba mad pa dang/ gang la mge dor ba med pa dang/ gang la mag tu rtog pa med pa dang//
gang la mag tu sams pa med pa dang/ gangal mgi yongs su 'grub pa mad pa dang/ gang la mge 'gog pa med pa dang/ gang la meg skya ba mad pa dang/ gang lamig tu 'dzin pachod pa dang/ gang la mig 'ong

ba mad pa de la ni khyod kyi gnas med do// yul med do// bdag po med do// stobs mdango// dbang phyug mdado// mthus bzung khamad do// sdig can dag de ba'an du/ gangal rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus
dang/ yude dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ rogabya dang/ chod mad pa dang/ gangal chos kyi 'du shes mad pa dang/ gang la chos su lhag par 'dzin pa mang pa dang/ gang la chos kyi
mtshan ma med pa dang/ gang la chos su lhag par dmags pa med pa dang/ gang la chos su mngon par chags pa med pa dang/ gang la chos kyi rlom sems madab dang/ gang la chos bdag kare'adzin pa yod pa

dang / gang la chos kyi rtan madapa dang/ gal chos la mngon par zhan pa mad pa dang/ gang lachos kyi sbos pa med pa dang/ gung la chos nga'i ba nyid med pa dang shu gong la chos kun tu srung ba med pa dang/ gapal
chos bsgom pa chad pa dang/ gang la chos blang ba med pa dang/ gang la chos dor ba med pa dang/ gangal chos su rtog pa med pa dang/ gang la chos su sems pa mad pa dang/ gang la chos yongs su 'grub pa

kha/ med pa dang/ gang la chos 'gog pa med pa dang/ gangal chos skya ba med pa dang/ gang la chos su 'dzin pa chud pa dang/ gang la chos 'ong ba med pa de la ni khyed kyi gnas med do// yul medado// bdag po mang ngo//
stobs med do// dbang phyug mad do// mgrus bzung ba mdado// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta de ltar chos bstan pa des/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor dalas bdud khri khran mad pa yang dag par rdzog
pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor de las bdud brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams chos kyi mig rdul mdacing dri ma dang bral brnag par dag go/ de nas khacom
ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dare mchis lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub semra
dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du nan/ bcom ldan 'das skyas khu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dwang 'dedag da blta bar 'dod kyi/ khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pas/ byang chub sams dpa' chos dang/ chos 'phags dang/ chos kyi blo gros dang/ nyi ma dang/ bdud kyi mtshon cha dang/ 'jam dbyangs dang/ sdeke pa bzhedang/ zhekha srung dang/ rnam rgyal srung dang/
chos rgyal rnam bsgrags dang/ ded dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyod cag gi rangarang gi sangs rgyus kyi zhing dgan/ byang chub sems dpa'/

de dgakrilus 'dra ba delta bur khyed cag rangarang gi lus ston cig/ 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pas tsheg ngoskad ces smras ma trag tu/ donas de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' de dag tapo nge 'dzin de las

las te// langs nas kyang rang rang gi lus dag bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi lus ni re re tsam mo// kha cag gi lus ni dpag tshad brgyad khri tsam mo// khacig gi lus ni dpag tshad bdun/
