mdamag 'dalagi/ pham ma mchis dgra bcom ma'i// 'di la 'gum pa ma mchis te/ 'gum pa 'ga' mang mchis ma lags// mnyam nyid ji bzhin 'byung ste// den chos rnams mtshan
nyid lags// 'jam dbyangs shes rab chen po pa// chos rnams pha rol phyin pa yis// mtshon rnon me thogs nas ni// sangs rgyas ga la bzhugs par brgyugs// sangs rgyas ji bzhi zhi
mtshon de bzhi// de dag gnyis ka mtshan nyid gcig/ ma skye 'byung ba ma mchis te// 'dil dgum pa 'ga' ma mchis// mtshon cha thogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'da bshad pa na// phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi ma snyad dga rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing/ sa chen pog los ba'anga'ajig rten du byung par gyur te// des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sangs rgyas bkaldan 'das gang dag bzhugs 'tshogs pa de dal/ la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur dag gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gag dog sa chen po g.yos pa
'di lta bu 'ajig rten du byung ba 'di su'i ma lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mimajed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba chos ston to// 'jig rten gyi khams chamadzed de na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa zhes bya ba thun med pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des/ 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gdul ba'i dbang gaphyir/ shes rab kyi rel sgra'i mtshon rnon po thogs te/bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su brgyugs so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gas shes rab kyi mtshonalas brtsams te/ nasakyasoms na dam/
tumed pa dag la rnam par dag ba dang/ sems rnam par grol ba dang/ bzod pa skyes pa dang/ byang chub la zhugs par gyur pa de lta de ltar chos bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang
'khor dad sems can las dang po pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnam par rtog pa mang ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis mtshon de tsho mthong zhing/ chos bstan pa de'ang ma thos pa de lta
byin gyis brlabs so// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ston pa dgos pa'i phyir/ brtul ba'i
las mi bzad pa mngon par 'dus byas pa de khyed la gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ kho bos las maM

bzad pa de lta bu ni byas na/ de gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i gnas mi shes so// btsun pashA ri'i bu de lta mod kyi sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i las gang du rnam par smin par 'gyur ba der kho be'i yang rnamalar

smin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sgyu ma'i skyes bu'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ chos thoms cad kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa shAri'i bu 'di
ltar de btsun pa nyid la dris/ khyod ji ltar bzod pa de ltar ston cig/ btsun pa mtshon dmags su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de nam yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras
pa btsun pa las dmigs su yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de nam yAni// 'jamadapa' gyis lcasapa ]btsun pa rnam par sna pa dmags su yod dam/ shA
[o] ]ri'i lus snas ba/ 'jam dpal don ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa// btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshon yang mar/ las kyang med/ rnam par smin pa'i ng med na/ 'an las de gang du/
rnam par smin par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smas pa// 'jam dpal khyod kyi bsam pas bstan pa ltar na/ las de na gang du'ang rnam par sman pa ma 'gyur 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
thams cad las med pa// rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyir le/ 8nas bcom ldan 'das la gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
de dag gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nas kyang bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu mazhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu chos sten pa
'gyur ba de ltar thugs brtse bas sngo bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag
ji rang rang ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi rang rangag sangs rgyas kyi'ang rnams su bltas so// bltas pa na phyogs
btsun gyi rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag/las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sgra snyan pa'i ng thos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi/
sbyan snga na 'dug cing/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid 'dra bo la chos ston pa dang/ de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de snyad dang/
lha'i bu 'dus pa de snyad kyang mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dazhes kyang ma g.yol/ thams cad du'ang de bzhi nyagar
ston pas ngomatshar to// ngomatshatosnyam du ngo mtshar dang ldan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag/
'di lta ste/ dpar sgyu ma mkhanan sgyu ma shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir stan las kyang ma g.yo la/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang ston par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpo'ashes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba lalegs par yaMslabs pa'i ng sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du de bzhin nye bar ston par 'dod pa de snyad du sprul ba dag sprul ba'i byed do// de ci'i phyi
zhan/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'di sgyu ma lta bur rig pa'i phyi'i go/ dmas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam gras/

'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de la tshes dang dge 'dun 'byung ba dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangasa'adi thos pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa 'bras bu dang 'dra'o/

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa des phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dra'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos bde ni/
dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'dra ste/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mes shing yid ches pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang yin pa de na 'dra ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de da lta lags te/ de ni stong pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de mtshan ma mamachis pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// re ni smon pa mgarI
pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni chos kyi dbyings ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// des yang dag pa'i mtha' ji lta ba de
ltar 'dra ba lags so// de ni mnyam pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// de na rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so// des dben pa ji lta ba de ltar 'dra ba lags so//
de nas bcom ldab 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol te/ 1bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad tsazhes kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha mar gyur pa/
spyod par 'gyur zhing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi rna lam du grag par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha dang mi rnams kyi rol mo'i sgra gang ji snyed ba de dag thams cad ma dkrol bar sgra grag cing/ shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang me tog sna tshogs

dag rab tu rgyas la lhags par gyur to// rdzing bu dag zhus kyang par mang po dang rab tu 'thon par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ing rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shade/

snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// lha bye ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas me tog gi
char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing/ phye mdang/ sbos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa'i mar dag kyang mngon par rab tu 'bebasaso// sal snyan dag kyang rab tu gsal zhing/ lha rgyudabyang
mang po dag kyang bsgrags nas/thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar ba btudade/kha mthun par tshig 'di skad ces/ a la la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas bstan pa'i chos/ a lal chos/ a la la chos/ 'jig rten

zlar du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba'ang mthong ngo// sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang/ thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba de dag zhi dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma la'i//
! gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sngonagyi rgyal sa la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ zab mo la bzod pa yin no zhes kyang smras so// degs bam
ldan 'das la'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du snga ltas 'di dag byung ba las na/ 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i/
dus na skyed par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra// 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byon gyis brlab pa'i phyi'i snga ltas byung ba 'di dag yin no//'jam dpal gyis
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi re'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlab mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'jam dpal bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la brten nas/ rnam par grol ba'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tho
man spyod par gyur cig// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gas bdag mamachis pa dang/ sems can ma mchis pa dang/ srog ma mchis pa dang/ gang zag
ma mchis pa dang/ sher las skyes ma mchis pa dang/ shed bu ma mchis pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya thaman spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang/ zhe sdang ma mchis pa dang//
[s]@#/// gti mug ma mchis pa dang/ mngam mchis pa dang/ gzugs ma mchis pa dang/ rgyus mchis pa dang/ lta ba ma mchis pa dang/ srid pa ma mchis pa dang/ srid pa
yongs su 'tshol ba ma mchis pa dang/ lus ma mchis pa dang/ lus su gdags pa ma mchis pa dang/ sems ma chis pa dang/ sams su gdags pa ma mchis pa rang/ dran pa ma mchis pa dang/
dra bar bgyid pa dag ma mchis pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dgam mchis pa dang/ gzhag pa ma mchis ba dang/ nye bar gzhag pa mamachis pa dang/ gzugasam mas pa dang/ tshor ba a mas
pa dang/ 'du shes ma mchis pa dang/ 'du byed rnams ma mchis pa dang/ rnam pa shes pa ma mchis pa dang/ mig ma mchis pa dang/ gzugs ma mchis pa dang/ rna ba mamachis pa dang/ sgra
tshamachis pa dang/ sna ma mchis pa dang/ dri ma mchis pa dang/ lcamams pa dang/ ro mamachis pa dang/ lus mamachis pa dang/ rig bya ma mchis pa dang/ yid ma mchis pa dang/ chos ma
wI mas pa rang/ 'dod pa'i khams ma mchis pa dang/ gzugs khams ma mchis pa rang/ gzugs ma mchis pa khamasamamachis pa dang/ 'di la rtag pa ma mchis pa dang/ na pa mams
bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgyatha man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa mamachis
pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs ba 'brasabumamachis pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ams pa dang/ phyi'i mi 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang/ phyi'i mi 'ong/
pa'i 'bras bum mchis pa dang/ dgra bcom pa ma mchis pa dang dgra bcos pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang/ rangasangs rgyas mamachis pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma mchis pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa ma mchis pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams ma mchis pa dang/ stebs rnams ma mchis pa dang/ ma 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis pa dang/ ya shas ma mchis
ba dang/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa dang/ stong pa nyid ma mchis pa dang mtshan mam mchis pa ma mchis pa dang/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma mchis pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba nyire
mchachis pa dang/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa dang/ 'thob pa ma mchis pa dang/ mngon sum du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa dang/ rig pa mamachis pa dang/
rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang/ 'grom ma mchis pa dang/ pha rol ma mchis pa dang/ tshul ma mchis pa dang/ thar pa ma mchis pa dang/ ming ma mchis pa dang/ ming du gdags pa ma
tshams pa'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dusalnga brgya tha ma na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos
bstan pa 'dis 'ga' yang ma sbyar/ ma grol/ sa sbyor rnam grol ba'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'dam 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man
spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gas sems can 'ga' yang
ma bkrol/ longs sumyang n las ma 'das/ de dag gis sems can 'ga' yang ma b.res/ ma bshage/ chos 'ga' yang ma bskyed/ ma bkag/ rnam par ma bshig/ ma bskyod pa dang//
sgyu ma 'ongs ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang 'grol bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar ma 'gyur/ de dag
gis sems can 'ga' yang b.rus par ma 'gyur/ 'jig par ma 'gyur/ chos 'ga' yang skyed par ma 'gyur/ 'gog par ma 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par ma 'gyur/ skyod par mi 'gyur
pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sems can 'ga' yang mi 'grol/ yongs su mya ngan las ma zlo// de dag sems
can 'ga' lang ma borAs/ mi 'jig/ chos 'ga' yang ma skyid/ ma 'gog/ rnam par mi 'jig/ ma skyod pa'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam gras 'dra ma 'ongs/
ba pa'i dus lnga brgya tha man spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis chos bstan pa 'di la cung zad kyang ma smras/ ma brjod/ ma bshad/ ma bstan/ ma
brtags/ ma bsgrugs/ ma bsnyad/ma smos/ma zlas shing/ chos bstan pa 'di la ma gi gcig kyang ma brjod la/ chos bstan pa 'di gang gis kyang m mnyan/ 'ga' yang nyan par mi 'gyur/ zhag gar yang

rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha na 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i

tshig gang gis 'das tshul khrims ma mchis pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bum mchis pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin ma mchis pa dang/ ting nge 'dzi gyi gnas ma mchis pa dang/ shesa'ab ma mchis pa dang/ shes rab kyi

dbang po ma mchis pa dang/ rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma mchis pa'i bden pa dang/ bden ba'i tshig des chos kyi ma grongs 'di 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brlatha na 'dzam bu'i gling
na spyod par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sbyin ba sol bar mi bgyid/tshulakhrims srung bas tshabargyad/bzod pa sgrub pa mi bgyi// brtson 'grus
rtsom pa mi bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams sgom pa rigs brgya'i shes rab spyod par mabargyad/ byang chub don du gtor bar bgyidi/ yang dag pa 'jug bar tsha bgyid/ byang chub thob por ma bgyid/ stobs
rnams thob par mi bgyid/ ma 'jigs pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ dbang po rnams thob par mar gyod/ se so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ chos kyi 'khor
la skor bar mi bgyid/ sems can grol bar ma brgyade/ smra bar mi bgyid pa'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig de hU~M kyi rnam grangs 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tham na 'dzam bu'i gling na med par
gyur cig/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'i
[ ]byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'ji na du dog sa cher g.yos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyun gang lags/ rkyenazhi gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa dman pa la mos pa'i soms can 'di ngag 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/ ma legs kyis thong shig/ de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/
lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad du bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'das phyogs 'di nyid du sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun
cu rtsa bzhis bstan te/ thams cad dung 'jam dpal gan nur gyur pa dang/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus so// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/
lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa brag
'bul 'das ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas me tog mngon par 'phags pa seng ge 'i rtsal gyi yon tan phung pe zhes bya ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
ba shar ba na/ sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de'i nyes 'gyur snyed kyis phyir ma ldog pa'i bzod pa thob bo/de'i
nyis 'gyur snyadan chos nams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang/ ji ltar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha'i bu de dag dang/ tshe dang ldan pashA ri'i bu dang/ gnas brtan 'od sud+ma
chen bo dang/lha dang/ modang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za' bcas ba'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa' mngon par bastod do/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
ga/ chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ 'dus pa sum cu drug pa rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi 'an khos ren dra bo d+hi dang/ badzra bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi la rtsa bzhang ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyuracing zhus te gtan la phapa pa/ bam po bzhi/ shrIka stong nyis brgya//
rgyagar skad du/ Ar+yasang nyapa ri tsi nAm mahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa seng gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga
bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//
rgyal ba gang zag mtshungs pa med// rgyal po ma skyes dag la bu// seng ge zhes grags pa zhig/ tshong dpon bu mo lnga brgya yis// mdun du bdar te lcan cig tu// rgyal po'i khab nas de byung nas// rgyal
pa'i 'byor pa chen po yis// gsalas byas pa'i gdugs thogs te//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gan song nas// zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// lnga brgya po yis gdugs de dag/ tshang ba'i thub pa
che la phul/ kun kyang byang chub don du zhugs// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mthu yisan// de dag mi 'jigs skyes gnas// sang chegs thal mo sbyar byas te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la zhus pa na// byang chug
sems dpa'i spyod pa gang// de na'adren bas bdag la gsungs// gang gis mdzes par 'gyur ba lags// gangags rdzus te skye bar gyur// skye ba dran par ji ltar 'gyur// thub pa chen pos lung bstan/
gsol// de dag lhag bsam ye shes kyis// mkhyen nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhes// khyod kyis dris pa de bstan to// bzod pa yi ni mdzes par 'gyur//
tshangs par spyad pas rdzus te skye// chos kyi sbyin pas skyel dran// gzhon nu de ltar shes par gyis// gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang// gser mdog 'dra ba'i lus
gyur zhing// de mthong sems can dga' bar 'gyur// sbyin pa kun gyi mtshan du 'gyur// byams pas de bzhin dpe byad bzang// sems can kun la sems mnyam pas// rgyal bags
gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur// gzungs ni gang gis thob par 'gyur// gang gas ting 'dzin skyes 'gyur lags/ gzung ba'i tshuli cu gang gis 'gyur// thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// chos
la bzed pas gzungs rnams 'thob// sems bsgoms pas na tong 'dzin skye// bkyal pa'i tshig rnams spang byas zha// gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// sha dang ldan pa ji ltar
'gyur// thug pa ji ltar blo gros ldan// ji ltar chos spyod 'gyur ba lags// skyes bum pa mkhas cis 'gyur// g.yo med pas na dregs ldan 'gyur// don la sems pa//
blo gros ldan//gus dang bcas pas chos spyod 'gyur//chos kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pa mkhas// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan lam+pan// las gang gsan skyi bar la/ 'jig rten mgon gyi mngon sum du//zhung

zhu bar ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis chos kyi sbyin pa la// nam yang bar chad ma byed pa// de na des na myur rab tu// 'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur// gang gisagi khom sbyong bar 'gyur// gang gis bzad
'gror ma 'gyur lags// skye ba kun tu skye ban// bag mchis pa na ji ltar 'gyur// dad pas ma khom spong bar 'gyur// tshul khrims kyis ni bzang 'gror 'gro/ stong panyidesha bsgom byas na// rtag tu
bag dang ldan par 'gyur// thub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ji ltar las rnams dag par 'gyug/ ji ltar bdud kyis snyas mi thogs// ji ltar chos si 'phongs gyur song// rnam par grol
bas las rnams bdag/ brtson 'grus kyisan bdud 'dul 'gyur// sbas de bzhin byed pas ni// chos kyis 'phongs pa spong bar 'gyur// ka la bang ka'i sgra snyan dang// tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar ji
ltar 'gyur// thub pa mos pa sna tshogs kyi// sems can rnams n gang gis dga'/ bden par smras pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs// ngag rtsub spangs pas sgrasnyan 'gyur// bkyal pa'i tshig dang
phra ma rnams// ngas pas sems can dga' bar 'gyur// ji ltar tshe rang 'gyur ba lags// bzhad nyung ba ji ltar 'gyur/ rnam par 'dren pa gang gis na// g.yog 'khor rnams lo phyed 'gyur/
gsod pa mi byed tshe rang 'gyur// ma'atshobasazhad nyung 'gyur// mamathun pa dag bsdums byas na// g.yog 'khor rnams na mo phyed 'gyur// don rnams ji ltar 'grub 'gyur lags// gang gsalos
spyod nyams ma 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skye ba der// dbang chen grags pa ji ltar 'gyur// chags pa med pas don rnams 'grub// ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel// gang dang gang du skye
pa der// phrag dog med pas dbang cher grags// ji ltar lha yi mig 'thob 'gyur// lha ya rnapa ji ltar theb// sems can 'chi'i pho skye bdag/ 'dren pa bgang gse 'tshal bar 'gyur// ma mo sbya'i
bas mag 'thob 'gyur// rol mo'i sgra yis rna ba dag/ 'chi'aphe skyashes yo shes kyis// de bas de ltar 'grub par 'gyur// 'dren pa byang chub sems dpa' yi// zag pa gangagasabs par 'gyul/
tshe rabs snga dran nyis 'gyur lags// rdzu 'phrul ca yis thob par 'gyur// bzhon pa sbyin pas rdzu 'phrul 'thob// dran pa bsgoms pas rjes sudran// mtha' gnyis rab tu spang byas na// zag pa
zad pas reg par 'gyur// gang gis zhing ni phun sum tshogs// nus na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// gang gis phun sum tshogs 'od 'gyur// gang gis phyogs bcur lhang der gda'//
smon lam gyisan phun sumazhing// bsdu bas dge 'dun phun sum tshogs// 'di'i narin chen gdugs phul bas// phyogs bcur lhang nger snang bar 'gyur// chos rnams
thams cad bsdu bzhi/ chos gang gsan thob par 'gyur// gang dang gang du skyes pa der// byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba thob// sems can thams cad thar bya'i phyir// byang chub don du sams
btud pas// des na chos rnams bsdu ba'ang 'thob// des n dga' ba 'ong 'thob par 'gyur// bslab pa ci 'dra bslabs pa dang// sems ni ci 'dra bsgoms pa yis// thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i//
( ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad la// mnyam pa'i sems nying bsubs pa dang// mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na// thams cad zil gnon rgyal bar
'gyur// skyab kun tu byang chub sems// rmilam na yang sems de na// 'dor na 'gyur na mnyal myo/ smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur// grong dang grong khyer rnams su 'am// gang du ga
ra/ pa'i yul rnams su// byang chub la na yang dag 'dzad// des na sems 'dor mi 'gyur// gang dang gang du skye bar yang// ji ltar stobasan cho 'gyur dang// rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang/
bdud rnams bye bas tshugs ma 'gyur// 'dirin snying po lnga byon zhing// skag la ma 'jigs bya zhan// gang dngagang du skyes par yang// des na stobs na chor 'gyur te// rtag tu mthu yas 'phag/
0 pa dang// bdud rnams bye bas ma tshugs so// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de// 'jig rten mgon gyis mngon sum du// lung bstan pa 'di thos nasasu// seng ge yid ni dega' bar gyur//
sengag grogs dang lhan cig tu// 'di skad ni tshig smra ste// spyod pa bstan pa 'dil// bdag cag rjes su bslab par bgyi// de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de// stong gsum po yang
g.yos gyur nas// ma pham pas na sangs rgyas la// ci zhig sad du 'dzum mdzad pa// thub chen lung bstan gsol zhes zhus// de skad zhu bzhus pa dang// ma pham pa la sangs rgyas kyisa'adi
skad ces bka' stsal to// gang gi phyir zha'adzum mdzad pa// ma pham pa las 'di'i nyon cig/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad zhu dang// gzhan yang khrag khrig phrag bcul// byang nub don du 'dus nas
na ma yo 'dren pa rnams la mchod// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/mar me mdzad pa tshunachadadu/bram ze'i khye'u 'di dag rnams// nga yis yongs su sman par byas// snang ba che
zhes bya ba yi// bskal pa chen po 'byung 'gyur te// de dag bskal pa gcig de la// rnam par 'dren par 'gyur ba ste// ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes// 'jig rten 'den pa rnams su
gyur//'od dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar// de dag gi yang de 'drar 'gyur// byams pa nas na bzung nas su// bskal pa sum brgya tshapa// de yi bar du dus kun tu // rtag tu sangs rgyas thad par 'gyur/
'di dam byang chub thob pa yi// mang ni gangasus thos pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'jig rten du// kun mkhyo gang zag mtshungs med 'gyur// gang zhig lung bstan
'di thos nas// mos pa skyed par byed pa na/ 'jig rten gsum po 'di dag na// de dang mtshungs pu'i bsod nams mer// gang gis bskal pa drug stong du// sangs rgyas zhing+ge rnams thams cad du//
rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas s// byang chub phyir 'dir byin pa bas// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ thosazhas byang chugaphur 'jugan/ sngar smos pa ma bsod nams kyis// grangs dang
char yang ma yod do// chos 'di bshad pa'i tshan na// 'jig rten mgon po'i mthu yis/// lha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs// stong gsum po yang g song bar gyug/ seng ge grogs dang bcas pa yis
mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas/ de nyin bdun bar du mchod byas te// bstan pa 'awa raphatu byung// de kun gyisan ting 'dzin thob// zad tshashos kyi gzungs kyang thob// sems can rnams
kyi don byed de// sangs rgyas chos la 'dzin par byed// chos kyi rnam gangs 'dabastan pa// sems can bye ba phrag brgyad cu byang chub mchog la zhugs so// bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ sang ge grogs dang bcas pa dang/ lha dang/ mi dang lha ma ni dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rtenayo rengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsas
[s/]pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa seng gsazhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa sum cu rtsa bdun
pardzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po da shAl dang/ mun bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi le tsab bde ma shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcosazhas
ba gtan la phab pa'o// klo ka drug cu'o//// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yasarba bud+d+ha ra ha skyo pA yaka' shal mya/ dzAnod ta ra bo d+hi satA pa ra bIts+tsaM
ba rabirtonA ma mahA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa/ byang chub soms dpa' ye shes dam pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba thog
ba chen po'i mdo////bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ slob pa dang/ mi slob pa'i ga slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge bdun chen po dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po khri drug stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa/ mngon par shes pha gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa sgrub pa lamakhas pa/
ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ba/ yon tan 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa 'asha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyem
red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ ring po ma len par 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskoratsang/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston taM/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog
mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ sa bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to/
de'i na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yaM shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid 'dus te 'dug par gyur te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo ye shes dam pa stan las
langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzanas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ pazem ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
tshu skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus sazhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbya bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' ga zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma shes dam pa la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci'adod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shag dang/ sadris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems yangs bar bya'o/ daskad
ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ya shas dmapas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pathabs lamakhas pa zhes bgyi// thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ler shes dam bal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed skye bomang pol bzha pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ lha rnams dang ma rnams kyi skye bo phal bo che'i
dog dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ da ltar dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa rjes su longs su gzung ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thamasacad
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyi'i zhugs te/ rigs
kyabu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dri bar sems pas regs kyi bu lung khyod legs so// 'gis kyi bu de'i/
[+ ]phyi'i legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa khyod la bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin zhes gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// gis
kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa na zan kham gcig tsam yang sems can thams cad la sbyin par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'dal byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pothabs la mkhas pa na gang gi tsho dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan kham gcig tsam sbyin par byed na'ang/ de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi sa'i
par byed cing/ dge ba'i rtsa bde'ang sems nyan thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// de rgyu gnyis kyis na sems can thams cad la longs su
sngog byed de/ gnyis gang zhan/ thams cad mkhyen banyid kyi sems dang/ yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa nyid kyis te/ rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs l
mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas par gzhan gyi da ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pal rjes su yi rang

bar byed cing/ rjes su yi rang nas kyang sems can thams cad 'ad yongs su bsngo zhing btang ste/ yongs su sngo bar mang byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba deg
byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag gang dag yin pa de dag kyang la gyis gnon par byed la/ len pa po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zilakyis gnon par
byed do/ rigs kyi bu de'abyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thebs lamakhas ba yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa' chen po/
thabs la mkhas pa na phyogs bcudag nam tog gangeshing ljon pa dang/ spos kyi shing ljon pa dang/ ma tog dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ sa dang/ phye ma dang/ byug pa bdag gam
byas shing/ yongs su ma gzung ba gang ja snyad pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung zhing/ yongs bsdusanasasangs rgyas thamasacad la 'bul bar byed cing/ dgaba'i rtsa ba de

sems can thams cad la gtong bar byed de/ yongs su btang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su rtogs par byed do// phyogs bcu dag na me tog gapishing ljon pa dang/ spos kyi shing ljon pa dang zhe
tog dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ skyes dang/ phyi ma dang/ byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs su gzung ba dang bcas pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi du rlung gas btab/
pa'ingad de dag kyang/ byang chub sems dapa' thabs la mkhas pas sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing/ dgaba'i rtsa ba de'ang bdag dang sems can thams cad kyisazams tsadamkhyen pa
nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do// de thams cad mkhyen panyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/
rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tumed pa thob par 'gyur to/ rigs kyi ba de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs lamakhas pa
mnano/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba
chu gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus te 'chags par byed cing/ 'di ltar sems can
za de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi lus la 'bab par 'gyu zhing/ sems can de dag bde bar gyur cig ces go chagyen par yang byed do// phyogs
bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dgan sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang dag yazhi pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs lamakhas pas de dag yang dag par bsdus te rjes su
ma long bar byed cing/ rjes su ma rang nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pas/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhu bar bya ba'i phyir
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dag ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyus thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa ba/ci'i
la phyag byas/ bkur sti byas/ bla mar bus/ ramib byas/ mchod ba byas/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 'di ltar se sor rtog par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
na chos kyi dbyang sagacig las nges par byung ba dang/ tshul khrims gcig pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gcig pa dang/ shes rab gcig pa dang/ rnam par grol ba gcig pa dang/ rnam par grol
ba'i ya shes mthong ba gcig pa dang/ ma shas gcig pa dang/ rig pa gcig pa yA/zhes so sor rtogs par byed do// des de ltar so sor brtags nas 'di ltar shes par byed de/
de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur sti byas/ tha mar byas/ riger byas/ mchod pa byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad la phug byas ba dang/ bkur lta byas pa dang/ bla mar byas pa dang/ mi'i byas pa dang/ mchod pa byas pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par byed do// byang nub/
soms dpa' thabs lamakhas pan phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mchod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bsam pas yongs su bzung nas/ thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed de// rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhasapa yanen// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa na be nga gi tsho gle tshul bar gyur na'ang/ de bdag nyid khyad du gsod par m byed cing zhum par mi byed par/ de than tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig
sgyur tsam la'ang 'jug pas byed rung/de 'di ltar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin pa de na gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi
don yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do// des de ltar tshig pasha ba'i tshigs sukhacad pa gcig kha ton du bsubasanas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sAng rjechan po bskyod de/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur
sta dang/ grags pa 'dod pa med pas/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ lul 'khor dang/ rgyal lo'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skye bo mang bo la tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa de
rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed cing/ 'di ltar smon lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su gang dag gis bdag gatshog bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams
cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs par yang byed do// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa des sems can thams cad
kun dga' bo ltar mang du thos par 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi srobs pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang nub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa zhi'o//
rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs lamakhas pan gal te brgya la brgya lam na dbul bor gyur na'ang/ des thon gzhan gyi las kyang byas te/
kha zas rnal ze gang tsam yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis dge 'dun nam/ gang zag la 'bul bar yang byed do// phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed do/ bcom lda'adra
kyis sems rgyas chen pos byin na sbyin pa'i ng rgya chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas// 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di ni chung mod kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis
sbyin pas dpag tu med par 'gyur ro snyam du so sor rtog par byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sims tshad med par gyur pa des kha zas zhal za gang tsam po de sbyin par
byed cing/ bdag gi dge ba'irtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ dpe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasashAkya thub ba ji

lta ba bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing/ lagan rin po che grub bar gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su

bsngos pa des/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa tshu byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'ang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog kyang/
'grub par 'gyur/ lagazhi ni kho tsho'ang 'grub par 'gyur/rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa min na// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang/

zla nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur
kyang/ de dag la dga' bar ma byed rung/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod la/ bdag la de lta ma yi/
bar mthong na'ang/ de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rtog par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adasa rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas/
bcom ldan 'das rnams las nges pa byung ba/ ]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams yazhe no snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing de 'dar so sor rtog par yang byed de/ 'di dag la
bsnyen bkur lhag pa dag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di'i na bdagashazhi tu mchog dang shin tu gtso bo yon gyi u0f7a/ 'di dag nam yin no// 'di dag ni bdag ga la'i nor gyi phung po la longs su spyod
par byed pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'di dag la dag la dga' bar yang ma bya la/ 'di deg la phrag dog kyang bya'o snyam du so sor rtog par byed do// des lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa des/
gang gso de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas kyang khengs par mi 'gyul/ bsnyen bkur ma byas kyang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing/ sems la thams cad la thugs mnyam pa kun tu 'dzin par
mdzad pa lta bu'i rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba spangs pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ gi sa
kyi bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa na/ sbyin pa byas pas kyang pha la tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de// ji ltar yongs
su rdzogs par byed can/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gang gi tsho slong mo pa mthong ba na/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyidel
[M ]dmags te/ ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed cing gtong ba chen po'ang spel bar byed la/ sbyi'i nosnyam pa'i sems kyang skyed par byed pa gang yazhi pa de na/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
yin go/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs shing tshul khrims ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang/ sems na tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag yin pa de dag tshul khrims la 'god par byed
cing/ sbyin pa byin nas 'daster bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par byed pa gang ni pade na de de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byams pa'i sems dang/
phan pa'i soms dang ]ma 'dris pa'i sems dang/ ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang/ le lo med pa'i sems dang/ rtog pa med pa'i sems dang/ snyems pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par
sgyu byed pa gang lan pa de ba/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yani// bza' ba dang/ bca' po dang/ btung ba dang/ bldag pa dang/ kyang bdag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par sgrub pa byed
zhe cing/ rtsol ba byed pa dang/ lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang/ sems kyis zhal ta byed pa dang/ ldangab dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'ong bar byed pa ga nga a'i pa de na/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi phal tu
phyin pa yi// byin pa gang yin pa ya de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang/ dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba med pa gang yazhi pa de ni/
po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la go/ sbyin pa byin nas chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed de/ sus byan gsu la bya// tsazhig khyen/ 'di'i rnam par smin pa sus myong ba'agrul
zhes chos nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gzhol bar byed cing/ des de ltar yongs su btsal nas kyang/ gang gis byin pa dang/ gang la bya ba dang/ cazhib byas pa dang/ de'i rnam par sman pamyong
byed pa'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs pa gang yin pa de na/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa spyi'i
pa byin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thamadzacad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dmabs 'di
skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas sbyin pa gang gsasems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin
bar bgyid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de ni ngo mtshar
[3]@#/// lags so// bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka'astsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin taM/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
la mkhas panaM/ thabs la mkhas pang/ thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ sbyin pa chung du'ang chen por byed la// chen pon depag tu med pa dang gangs med par byed do//
renas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'ad skad ces bka' to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po thabs la mkhas pa na/ gal tib la brgya la b.laan sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang ngas/ sems kun tu rmongs pas nayes pa byung na'ang/ de 'ad ltar so ser slob sta/ bgal te bdag phung
po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyuranan/ de lta na bdag gas yongs su gdung bar bya dgos par 'gyur pas/ bdag gis 'di lta
go cha bgo bar bu ste/ bdag sems can rnams yongs su sminapar bya ba'i phyi'i/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar byang la bdag gi sems zhum par ma bya/ 'jigs pa
ma bya/ sems skrag par ma bya/ yongs su gdung bar maM bu shang/ ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su sAn par bya ba dang/ nyes pa 'di'ang
chos bzhin du phyir bya zhing/ phyin chad kyang nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba'i phyi'i chos bstan par bya'o zhes go ma gyon par byed do//
rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar gzungan/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba na/ gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung bar gyur na'ang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar
byed na/ rigs kyi bu ngan byang chub sems dpa' la nyes pa med ces sa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gas kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub
sems dpa' so so thar pa'i bslab pa la slob par byed pa na/ bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar byed cing/ sems can thams cad kyis legs par sbas pa dang/ nyes par
sbas so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/rigs kyi bu den byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyis pa 'bi

zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rtsa ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur pa ni phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched de dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'
[3]@#/ 'gyur ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ma bshags/ ma sngangs kyi ra
du bla na merapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med cing/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal ba med de/ de na gnas med
(da nas bcom ldan 'das la tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// tsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad ston pa
lags te/ mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mgazigs pa'i m/ thugs su ma chud pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma mdzad pa cung zad kyang mi mar lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad
cas dge slong gsanyes pa byung ba mthong n bcas par mi bya bar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smos shig ces bka' stsal lags pas/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi slad du mchib na/ grong khyer gzhan zhigan/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal
tsho pozhes bgyi ba khri'isnying na bud med gcig dang lhan cig mchis pa mthong ba de bdag byams pa dang ldan pa dang/ nongs pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lags
so/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig de skad ces gsol nas/ ring po ma lon par de nas de'i med la sa chen po 'da rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas de 'i tsho byang tshu
sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar steng gabar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras M
so// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' 'diji snyam du sems/ nyis pa'i chos dang ldan pas bar snang la 'dug pa'i nus snyam mtsha/ kun dga' bos sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu de na ma nus so// byang chub
sems dpa' tshegs can rab mchog rgyal pos smras pa6/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'di la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyis pa'i chos dang/
badris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
bdas/gas la gtso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa gang lags pa'i ngos la la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs
bar bshags pa gang lags pa de nongs pa la nongs par yos su gzung du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/kun dga' bo khyod/
theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag lanyis pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/ kun dga' ba 'di lta ste/ dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang bra bo/
gcig pu zla med pa zhi gnas kyi gnas pas gnas par byed pan zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/kun dga' bo byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po
thabs la mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa bud med kyi 'khor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing/ dga' ba dang/ rtsa ba dang/ dga' dgar spyod par byed pa'i ng thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par 'ag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' be byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa'i dkon mchog gsum po'o gsum gang//
ba/ sangs rgyas dkon mareg dang [ ]chos dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog dang/ bla na mar pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i ga yo ga 'khor gang
ngan pa de ma 'dzin pa'i phyire 'o// kun dga' bo gang ga tshokhyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i
yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa mthong na/ kun dgA bo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de nidi bzhi gshegs pa bu sa lnga
ldan zhing gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o// ku3dga' bo gang ga phyir byang chub sems dpa' lcogs can rab mchog rgyal po khri gcig gi steng bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyur pa
las nyon mi kun dga' bo bud med de na 'das pa'i dusan tshorabs lnga brgyar byang nubasems dpa' tshegs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi tshul bzhi'i ma yin pa de nyid kyis
rigs kyi bu de la lhag par sems kyis 'bral bar gyur kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos/sa na rab mcheg rgyal po de'i dpal dang/ gany+dzi brjod dang/ tshul khrims kyi stobs bskyed pa ma mthong nas
gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par ma nus nas/ de gcig pu dben par 'dug pas 'di lta bu'i sems skyed par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can ba mchog rgyal po bdag dang lhan
cig khri gcig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na/ bdag gses kyang bshamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tusems bskyed pa bu'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab
mchog rgyal pos srang mo de'i sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ ri nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang/ snga dro'i dus kyi sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas/
mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po la bsod snyoms kyi phyi zhugs so// de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyi'i rgyu ban/ sring mo de'i khyim ga la ba de zhugs nasaM/ nang gi sa'i
[n ]@#// khams gang yin pa dang/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa'i chos kyi sgo 'dus/ des sa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring mo
[A ]de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do// 'khod ma thag tu des de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so// sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad// de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin//
'dod la sred pa snga dras ngus na// mi na rtog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur//kun dga' bo de nas sring mo des tshigs su bcad ba de shes nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu rtaga' ba skyes te/
khri de las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can dang mchog rgyal po'o nang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod gangasangs rgyas smar pa dag/slon chad don
du gnyer cha bgyid/ 'dod la sredapa sras bgyis nas/ mi mchog sangs rgyas 'grub gyur cig/ bdag gi sems kyis gang bsams pa'i// nongs pa don khyod la rangugs// srog gas

kun la sman slad du// bdag ni byeng chub 'dun pa skyed// kun dga' bo de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po thabs la mkhas pa des/ sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yad dag par bstan/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par rab tu bzha gnas / stan las langs te songango// kun dga' bo de'i ltag pa'i bsam
ba'i khyad par la ltos/ kun dga' bongan sring mo de 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te/ bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa 'i 'og tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa

brgya nga com pa ya nga dag par rdzobs nga 'i sas rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral bzhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ des byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de marang sems can

ma dge ba'i kun nas ldang nga'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar ma 'gyur bar lung ston to//kun dga' bo rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' na 'kher gang bzung na log par ltung ba'i
chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal bo bar snang de las ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni thabs la mkhas pa dang snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi lags te/ btsun
pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag ni 'di sAm du gal te byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yad ngag pad bskyed pa'i slad du 'di lta bu'i rongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/
nongs pa ji lta bu byung bas bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par 'gyur yang 2 btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni nongs pa 'byungab dongang 2 sems
@#// can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la sbobar bgyi lags kyi/ sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba la ni ma legs so snyam du sems kha gas so/
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' su
rje chen po de lta bu dang ldan pan nyis pa'i chos dang yang ldan par mi 'gyur la/ nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu sa mngon bar shes pa'i phyir te 'das

ba'i dusan bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang chos grangs med pa rgya che ba[ ]dpag tu med pa// bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa// de'i tshe de'i dus ka bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba

zhig byung bar gyur te/ des lo bzhi khri nyesastong gi bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyad pa spyad nas/ de lo bzhi khri nyis stong po de 'das pa dang/rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so//

de grongakhyor chen bo der zhugs pa na/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khye'ugazugasabazang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa de mthong nas/ de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems

za kyis bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du rab tu brgyugs te rkang pa la gtugs so// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma des bu mo de la 'odi skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod ci 'dod/ des de la 'di skad ces smras

so/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni khyod 'tshal lo// des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ sring mo kho bo ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ kho bo ni tshongs par spyod pa yin no// des de la 'di skad
cesasmras so// bram ze'i khye'u galate khyod dang lhan cig skye 'gro kar ma 'gyur ba lta na bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdagagis/
lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangapar spyad pa spyad nas/ deng brtul zhugs bshig pa 'di ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo de mthus sbangs te bor nas/
gos ba bdun bor ba dang/ de gom ba bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe sIng rje chen po skyes bar gyur nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis brtul zhugs bshig ste/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang/
bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzod par bya zhing/ bu mo 'di bde bar 'gyur bdang/ 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo// rigs kyi
bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de de nas phyir log ste/ lag pa g.yas bas bu mo de bzung ste/ de la 'di skad cesasas so// bzang mo longs shig dang/ kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o//
de nas bram ze'i khya la ma de lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyim na gnas nas/ yang mngon par byung ste/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas/ de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i 'dzig rten/
@#// du skyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na/ khyod kyis

de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nganyid de'i tshe de'i dusan bram ze'i khye'u skaram zhes bya pa rer gyur to// shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de ni de'i tshe de'i dus tshong dpon gyi bu mor gyur to// rigs kyi

bu sa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des nyung zad tsam zhig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsilatsang sbas par gyur to// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag gi sems
can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gangayin ba de'ang byang chub sems dapa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'a jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba la ltos// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ya shes dam ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigasakyi bu gal to dge slong gA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu dag thabs la mkhas pa
mi'i bar gyur na ni dge slong ko ka li ka'ang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ ston 'dasaba'i dusan de bzhi
gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyusa 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dra med ces bya ba'i chos skya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de dgon pa'i phug cig na gnasaso//

[j]de da nga ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshe na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing/ char chen po bab par gyur to// de nas bud med gnyis shig grong ngar gyi lam

na 'dug pa de gnyis char ba de bskyab pa'i phyir dge slong dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te/ phug de nas phyir byung ba dang/ drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dgagis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri med kyi phug

nas phyir byang ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag 'di snyam du 1 a ma'o dgo slong dri med 'di ni sreg ba 'dod pa/ mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam nas/ tha ba dang zhe
sdong gi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgya tsam bo de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas de'i tsho steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la
ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug padrang srong de dag gis mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag las ni mi tshangs par spyod pas ni ster gi bar
snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la nyes par bshags so//

rigs kyi bu gal te dge slong dri med de de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par ma gyur na ni drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis se mas can dmyal ba
chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di drisnyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sbyor yid gnyis dang

the tshom kru bar gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams ba 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces byab der gyur to// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs
des khyod kyis 'di ltar gal te dge slong shA ra'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis de'i tshe steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni/ dge slong ko kali ka 'ang sems can
dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//gas kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur
ba de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na smad 'tshong ma sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par
lobs pa ni/ de'i 'og tu nor 'a dod pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs su btang zhing dga' ba ston pa dang/ ji srid du skyes bu de las don thams cad ma
bsgrubs kyi bar du de la yo byad thams cad kyang sri bar mi byed pa de lta de ltar gnas par byed do// de nas don bsgrubs zin pa'i 'ob tu ni de la mi lta ma sems par spong bar byed cing//
de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i ng/ thabs la mkhas ba des sems can 'di
ga longs su sIn bar bya'o zhes bya bar shes te// rnam grus rjesasems can de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cid/ de dag la yo byad thams cad kyang mi sribar byed
sems can rnams kyi ge ba la dga' bas/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong bar byed kyi yo byad la dga' bas ni ma yin no// gang gi tsho kyi ma sems can 'a di dag ni dege ba'i rtsa ba
byas bar gyur pa dag ste/ 'di dag gis phyir yongs su nyams par byed mi nus par shes nas ni/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba de dang 'brel ba'i sems kha gnas bar chabyed do/

gas kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpe na zhes yongs su gdus pa'i sa bon rnams n kha dog yongs su nyams pa med kyang myu gu 'byung ba'i skalca dmathams cad la ma lta bar sbas te/ 'grazhing ra 'gags na/ dar 'gacu 'dar 'dar ba dang
ban med pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ sen ba med pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdus na/ de 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed kyang/ log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa longs su 'dzin
/par mi byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi kha dog las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i
srog chags bung ba ni me tog thams cad las dri snom zhing ro myang bar byed kyang 2 gang la'ang rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par mi byed cing/ de dag las dra dang/
'dab ma dang/ sdong bu dang/ me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas par ng sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod
pa'i dga' ba dang/ rtse ra mo thams cad la yongs su longs spyod par byed kyang/ de dag la rtag pa'i 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed gnas kyi srid pa skyed par yang mi byed la/ bdug kyang
sas par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang smos par mi 'gyur bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nya ba shin tu legs par bslabs pa ni sras bu gcig la gzan ma btags te/
mchil pa byas nas/ mtsho chen po'i nang du 'dor ro// de srad bu legs par bsrungs pa gcig po des/ gang gi tsho 'dod pa de'i tshe na mtsho chen bo nas mchil pa de 'dren par byed pa de bge
du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpar thabs la mkhas par ng stong pa nyide dang 1 mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yosasu bsgoms
pa 'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtad bas/ 'dod pa'i 'dam chen por 'jug par byed kyang/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsdus pa des 1 gangag/
'dodo ba de'i tshong dod pa'i khams sngangs te/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba ni/ rgyal bo'i maM

rnams kyis bzung ste zhugs pa lnga'i chinges mas bcings par gyur kyang/ de ni gang gi tsho 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe na rig sngags dang gas nga sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis chings ma de dgazams
tshad bcad nas gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas ba'ang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gang gi tshe 'dod
ba'i yon tan lnga bodag gis dga' ba myong bar byed cing/ de dgadung 'dres par gnas par byed kyang/ degang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed bdang/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs bar bsrungs ba gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i ches ma de dag thams cad rab tu bshad re/ de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
du skye bar byed do// rigs kyi bu rad lta ste/ dper na 'phong gi slob dpon legs par bslabs pa zhig ral gri rnon bo ras bcos bus dkris pa zhig thogs te/ 'gron pa mang bo
sgrol bar byed pa de na/ sems can mi mkhas pa 'phong gi shes pa'i bya ba mi shes pa gang dag yin pade dag ni/ 'phong gi slob dpon de lasnyingang+ge ba dang [ ]brwas/
ba'i 'o du shes skyed par byed cing/ tshig 'di skad ces gzhu'ang med/ ral gri'ing med/ dongapa'i ng med/ 'khor yang med pa 'dis na de gron ba 'di dag 'astsal ra minus te/'dis ni bdag
nyid kyang thar pa byed mi nus na/ 'gron pa thams cad bsgral ba dang/ chom rkun pa'i sde pham par bya ba lta tsasmos te/ de ni gnas med pas/ 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro
zhes kyang zer bar gyur la/ de nas 'phong gi slob dpon de 'brog dgon par song te/ chom rkun pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na mda' gzhu thogs te/ go cha srab bgos nas/ mtshon cha de
gzas te chom rkun po rnams la 'debs par byed cing des chom rkun pa de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas/ yang mtshon cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
dba' thabs la mkhas pa'i ng sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha legs par thogs te/ thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po
bdag gis dga' ba dang/ rtse ba dang/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i shes pa re khong du ma chud pa de dag gis de maNong ba'i
tshe de dag de la ma dad pa dang [ ]snying rje skyed par byed cing 2 tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar bag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na/ sems
can thams cad bsgral ba lta ci smos shing/ bdud kyi sde pham par byed par lta ga la 'gyur te 1 do ni gnas med pas/ 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang zer mod kyi byang chub
sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang/ shes rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni gang gi tsho 'dod pa de'i tshon shes rab kyi mtshon des nyon mongs ba'i dra ba thams cad dral shing rab tugatugs
nas h+phe rapa dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bud med dang bral ba dang/ 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag ba dag tu 'gro bar byed do/ 1 gtam 'di brjod par gyur ba
de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs par gyur te/ de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen bor

ba sod snyoms sbyod pa na/ tshong dpon zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang/ tshong dpon de la bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog ces bya ba phyugs chung zhig yod par gyur pa khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa des dgo
slong de'i skad thos nas/ bsod bsdoms thogs te byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed ga lab der song ngo// de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed mthong
[]1/ ma thag tu/ 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis/ dpe byad las byad bzhin dang/ sga skad dang/ kha dog gi mtshan ma zung ba dang/ de 'dod chags
kyis kun nas pakris pa'i sems dang/ 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang/ 'dod chagasakyis yongs su gtugs pa'i sems dang/ 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs ba'i
sems kyis bsregs pas/ lus rdul bar gyur nas 2 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas/
tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas/ yud tsam zhig na de la dran pa 'di lta bu skyes paragyur te/ chos gang la
blo chags par gyur pa'i chos de gang yin/ ci mig mig la chags sam/ mig ni rgyags pa ma yin te[]g.yo ba med pa// byed pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ 'dus byas pa// rim pa bdun pa/ ]
! gsha'i ri lu yin ta/ mig de na rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/ sems par mi byed/ tshor bar mi byed do// rna bdung 1sna dang 1 lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ pags pa dang/ mdog dang/ shar ng
de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan chad klad pa man chad kyi bar la so sor brtags na/ nang dong phyi rol na gang chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga'
yang mad mig sa so// des ma dmigs nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems de dang bral bar gyur cing/ des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas/ chos thams cad ma skyes
bar rag nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la brjod pa thob par gyur to// de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te[ ]mnyan yor kyi grong
khyer chen po la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ nam mkha' de nyid las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba dang 1 bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo/
po gnyis pa/ 1bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las rung pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs
nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed steng gi bar snang las dang pa'i rgyal po ltar chags pa med par
'ong ba mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dparasems dpa' chen po dga'/
byed 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems la brten te chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas/ bdud kyi sde brtul cing chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/ 1de nas bu mo dpal yon
1 can gyi mchog 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus sbyangs te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa'i lus thob cing/sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha rnams dang

skal ba mnyam par skyes so// skyes ma thag chu de larini bo che snabadun las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa rang byung bar gyur/ de'i mgro byed pa'i bsnyen bkur ma lha'i bu mo khri bzhi
stong yang nye bar gnas par gyur to// de'i mod la des bdag gis lasaci zhig byas shing bsags bas 'di'i skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang de 'di snyam du gyur to/ bdag ni mnyan yod
kyi grong khyer chen por tshong dbon gyi bu mor gyur ba las/ de na bdag gis kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' khyod la bltas pa dang/ ba dag 'dod/
pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ bud med kyi lus brjes te/ bdag gis 'dir skyes pa'i lus thob cing/ bdag la 'byor pa
dbag tu med pa 'di lta bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to snyam nas/ sngon gyi las rjes su dran pa'i shes pa'i ng skyes par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags kyi sems
'i las kyang rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur na bdag gis dad ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la khyod la phyag byas shing/ bsnyen bkur byas na lta smos kyang
tsha dgos te/ bdag 'dod pas dga' ba dang/ rtse ba dang/ dga' mgur spyod cing bag med ba'i gnas pas gnas pa ni/ bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin zhing mi rigs kyis/ bdag bcom
ldan 'das ga lab dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der 'gro bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ gde nas lha'i bu de 'khor lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu
lha'i me tog dang/ sosadang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ga la ba der song nas//
kha dog shin tu 'thags pa shin tu 'phags pa'i snang ba chen posaM rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel snang bar byas te/ lha'i me tog dang/ sbos dang me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa de dag gis bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad dang [ ]dge slong gi dge 'dunagyi rkang ba la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 2 bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo pug
lug bor sbyar nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di deg gsol to// sangs rgyas ma mchog rnams n bsam mi khyab/ byang chub mchog la zhugs rnams bsam mi khyab/ bde
[ ]1gshegs rnams kyi chos kyang bsam mi khyab// grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa'i ng bsam mi khyab/ mnyan yod du ni bdag sngon bu mor gyur/ 'tshong bon bu mo
dpal yon mchog ces bgyi// mdzes shing thog mar phyags chung gyur ba lags//pha ma'i glo bar mchi zhing rab tubyams/ sas rgyas sras po snyan par mgyur ba// mthu chen dgar
byed cesabagyi gang lags ba// bsod snyoms spyod cing mnyan yod rgyu ba'i tshe// de ni bdag gi ba yi khyim du mchis// skar snyan yid du mchi ba thos gyur nas// bdag cag sems kyis bsod
snyoms thogs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po gang legs pa/ dga' byed mthu chen g la mchis par mchis// mthong ma thag tu bdag ni 'dod chags dang// ldan pa tshul
bzhi ma lags sems skyes te/ dgal te ji ltar bsam bzhin ma mjal na/ srog la mi lta 'gum pa'i dus bgyid snyam// tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod pas rab gdus nas/ de la
sgyu dka' mchid brjod par bgyi ba dang/ bsod snyoms stsal ba'i rje yang ma thogs nas// rdzul byung der ni 'greng bzhin gum bar gyur// bcom ldan bdag ni 'chi 'bor gyur pa'i tshod/ skad
cig de la bud med lus spras te// shi 'phos mtho ris 'jig rten skyes gyur nas// bdag gis 'od gsal skyes ba ra ri nyid thob// rin chen sna tshog sabalta na sdug pa yi// gzhal med khar
mchog mdzes pa grub gyur cing// bdag gi g.yog 'khor lha yi bu mo ni// khri dang bzhi stong tshang ba'ang byung bar gyur// bdag la sems bzang byung bar gyur pa na// sug las gang gis rnam
smin 'di 'dra ba// rjes su dran nas ngan bu 'di snyam bgyid// tshogs bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste// dga' byed yid dga' 'od gsal mkhas pa la// chags bcas sems kyis
bdag gis bltas gyur pas// sug las de yi rnam smin bzang po des// na bu gzi brjid mthu stobs 'di 'dra bas/ chags bcas sems kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra na// gang gis de
la mchod bgyis ci smos te// gang la bde gshegs mkhyen pa 'jug 'gyur ba/ de ni nyan thos rang rgyal sa ma lags// nganabu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar// sangs rgyas
ye shes mchogarab bsgrub pa dang/ bskal pagang+gA'i bye snyed sbyad bgyi bar// bdag gi ngam btsas 'ji no sbyang mi bgyi// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngaga' byed dam ba la// chos
kyi mchod pa mchog gis mchod par bgyi// gang dgabyang chub 'tshol ba ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis 'di la 'dren rnams mchod mi 'gyur// bud med gang dag 'dod chags sems kyis/
bdag la rtog babud med lus bsgyur nas// de kun 'jigs med skyes pa 'thob 'gyur ba// byang chub spyod mchod dam pa spyad par bgyi// lus rdzalashi bar gyur pa mthong nasazhi/ 1bu
mo'i pha ma tsho nges 'debs byed cing// dge sbyong de yis byad stems byas snyam ste// du zhing dge sbyong rnams la mi snyan brjod// sangs rgyas daklu yis lha'i bu de ni//
sa song nas pha ma dag la tshig snas ba// dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed// yun ring sdug bsnga la 'grul bar ma byed cig dbu kho dpal yon gi 'khos gang yin de tag sum cu rtsa gsum skal
ba mnyamagyur cing/ des ni bud med lus kyang spangs byas te// de ni lha yi bu bo 'od gsal gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan sngar khyed deng la// khro ba'i sems kyi nyes pa 'dishegs shig/
sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams n ma gtogs par// sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen gnas gzhan med// 'jigs med de yis legs par bskul byas pas/ pha ma gnyis kyis sangs rgyas sgra
thos nas// nye du tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs gyur te// shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar dong bar gyur// ma mchog zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// khro ba'i sems kyi nyes ba bshags byas nas//
de bzhin gshegs la gus dang bcas byas te// bde gshegs rang byung la ni zhu zhus pa// ji tsam gyis na 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// chos dang dge 'dun ji ltar mchod pa lags// zhus pa de
! yolanan stsal du gsol// thos nas de bzhin gnas bgyi gzhan ma lags// rgyal bas de dag bsam pa dag mkhyen nas// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sangs/
0 rgyas thams cad mchod 'dod pa// de yas brtan par byang chub sems skyed cig dbu mo'i pha dang ma dang nye du ni/ lnga brgya tshangab nyung ba ma yin pas// skyes bu khyu mchog de yi gsung thos
nas byang chub phyir ni sems kyang brtan par bskyed// rgyal ba kun dga' bzang la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' ji skad bshad pa 'di nyon cig byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam yas
te/ shes rab thabs la mkhas pa'i ng de bzhin no// dga' byed smon lam yang dang yang 'debs pa// bud med gang dag chags pa'i sems kyis gi/ bdag la rtog pa bud med lus spangs nas//
de dag myur du skyes bu 'jigs med shog/ bud med gcig min gnyis rung gsum min te/ bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po rnams// gang dag dga' byed la ni chags gyur pa// de dag thams
mgo 'bos skyes par 'gyur// kun dga' 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis na// sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur pa// de yis dpar rnams mtho ris 'gro 'gyur zhing//
skyes par 'gyur ba'i yon tan de 'dra ltos// lha'i bu gang gis nga la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog zhugs pa// des na sangs rgyas bye mang mchod byas nas// rgyal ba
blta na mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur// lnga brgya gang dag byang chub zhugs gyur pa//de dag mi mchog rnams su 'byung 'gyur bas/ de gang la dad byas bde ba bsam yas ba'i de rag
rten mgon la su zhig gus mi byed// gang dag nyon mongs rnams kyang bde sbyin na// gang dag gus byed de la ci smos pa// grags chen sman gyi rgyal po lta bu la//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la susdang skyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// dper
bgyin/ sems can rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'a ma dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am// chags pa'i sems dang ldan ba 'am ka chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan bang
ts+tsha la la dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi drung du mchis na/ de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin ngu/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can ba du sdang
ba'i sems dang ldan pa ram/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'am/ chos kyi bar du gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du
mchis na'ang ro dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog tu sems gcig tu 'gyur lags pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan chad byang chub sems M
dpa' thams cad ri'i rgyal por reb dang 'dra bar 'dzin lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dras 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na sma na gyi rigs chen po blta mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis te sems can rab tu
sdang ba'i sems dang ldan ba ram dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can blo nad sna tshogs kyis thebasapa gang la la dag gis de mthong na/ de dag thams cad kyi bond rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag rab tu snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa ra ma/ dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi drung du mchis na/ ro dag
thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/gti mug dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bod rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo ji skad sbas ba bzhin rta/ legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srus
chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun ba bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar zhu ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas dag gis kyang gnas par
bgyi de la/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du 'dod pa'i khams na'ang kun tu gda' ba dang/ stong pa nyid dang 1 mtshan ma mchis pa dang/ smon ba ma mchis pa dang/ mngon
bar 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang gnas par bgyid la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang reg par mi bgyid bdang/ snying rje chen po'ang kun tu skyed par
0// bgyid la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la'ang 'jug par bgyid pa de ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyi ngo mtshar lags te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chags pa thams cad srung
bar ba gyid cing/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang/ skurang 1 dri dang/ro dang/ reg bya'i chags pa dag la spyod par bgyid kyang/ de dag la chags par yang mi 'gyur bde dag ni thabs la mkhasaM
pa bsam mi khyab pa la gnas pa lags te btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te 2 pe'oga' zhig brjod par spobs
lags so// bde bar gshegs pa spyobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po khyod bas par gyis shig/ 'od srungs chen pos
rgyu/ gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dpebagyi na 'brog dgon pa zhig mchis par gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa chen po de la'ang srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa'i ra ba mchis par
gyuracing 'brog dgon pa chen po der yang srog chags 'bum phrag du ma zhig zhugs par gyur la/ 'brog dgon pa chen po de la'ang chab sgo na gcig cig mchis par gyur cad/ 'brog dgo ba chen po/
de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na grong khyer chen po 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ gtsang ba/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang bos kun tu gtams pa/ nyams dga' ba zhig kyang mchis par/
