bshA sems can yongs su na bar byed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pas yang dag par rngan parwa brtson 'grus dang/ brtson 'grus kyis yang dag bar dran pa'i lhag
pa'i bsam pa dang/ lhag pa'i ngasam pas yang dag par rjen pa'i thabs dang/ thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab dang/ shes rab kyis yong ngag padra than pa'i bsam gtan pa
bsam gtan gyis yang dag par ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ mngon par shes pas yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes rang/ yi shes kyis yang dag par zin pa'i rtul ba dang/ rtul
dbas yang dag par zin pa'i dran pa dang/ dran pas yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i wasam
pas yang dag par zin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhes yang dag par zan pa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang/ tshul khrazhes kyi sdom pas yang dag par bzhi ba'i
thos pa'i nan tan rung/ thos pa'i nan tan gyis yang dag pa'i zin pa'i gzungs dang/ gzungs kyis yang dag par zani paN+Di spobs pa dang/ spobs pas yang dag bar zin
pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yang dag par bran pa'i Ti shes rab kyi tshogs/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyi'u
pod dag dang ldan na/ 'khor ba na yongs su maM skyob yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na 'an po mas yang
'ang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'angs ji ltar na byang chub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba na mdzes shing sku bo mang po rtsa bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i thos pas na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so/ thos pas brgyan par spobs pas na sa bo mang po 3
bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dran pa nyams pa med pa thob pa'i gzungs kyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// lag na 'ani po che mi zad pa'i longs spyod
kyisan skyo ngo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pas na 'khor ba na mdzes so//chos ston pas yongs su mi skyo bas na sku ngo mang po
nyi bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pas na 'khor ba na mdzes so ye shes kyis brgyan pas na skye bo mang po nye bar
'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas ni 'khor ba na mdzes so// de bzhin du byed pa nyid kyis kyang skye bo mang po zhi bar 'tsho
bar 'gyur// rngags kyi bu gzhan yang bdog pa thams rud yongs su gtong bas na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes so// so soru rigs par chos kyi sbyin pas na sku bo mang po
bar 'tsho bar 'gyu 'a ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ni byang chub sems dpakA 'khor ba na mdzes so// thos pa yongs su dag pas na sku ngo mang po chu badra
'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji ltar bag yod pas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shing skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de/ khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis 'ang ltar
rnage par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa da yangs pa/ tshad med pa/
bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa ngaga' bar gyur pa zhes bya pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya khar re bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lhadang mi rnams
kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung// gos kyi bu ci'i phyir bosal pa de raga' ba' gyur pa zhes bya zhe
na/ rags kyi bu bskal pa de la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur te/ de na gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dag gis kya ma'o grogs po dag 'du ni bskal pa bzang po yin te/ bskal
pa 'ang la sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba'i sgra bsgrags pa dang/ de na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rta na gyis dga' ba'i sgra de thos so//thos nas kyang dga' ba dang/
dad pa dang/ mos pa chen po skyes te/ de nas lha dang ma de dag gis kye ma'o bskal pa 'di ni dga' bar gyur pa'o zhes de skad smras pas/ de'i phyir bskal pa de'i ming dga' bar gyur
pa zhes btags so// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de lha thams cad kyis bltas brtags kyang/ de ngoms par ma 'gyur ba de tsam du blta na sdug cing/ de tsam du nyams ngaga'
bar gyur pas/ de'i phyir 'dzage na gyi khams de lhas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam por bltas pa de'i gzhi ni cin ratu sprul gyi
snying po sha stag ste/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po ra'i phyi ma khal gcig gi rin du'ang ma brjod do/'jig rten gyi khams de nas spos kyi ngad langs pa'i dris ni
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag tu khyab bo// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las gyur pa'i sa chen po de las 'od zer gyi dra ba snang pa zhes bya ba' lang chen po sha stag
byung bar gyur te/ pad+ma de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu snang bar gyur to// mde dag kyang tsan dan gyi phyi ma la byas pa'i khang pa brtse dang pu shu dang/ sgo khang dang//
khyams dang/ rta babs kyis legs par brgyan pa la longs spyod par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi lems de na grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdzal gnas pa med do// mi de dag thams
cad kyang nam mkha' la 'gro'o// de dag mngon par shes pa rab tu thob nos/ nam mkha'adekyil na 'dug pa'i khang pa brtse gas pa dag gi nang du 'jug nge nam mkha' la 'gro'o// 'jig rten
bya lems de na mngal na gnas pa'i ng med de/ mi de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skya ba sha stag go/ de na dung med kyi ming yang mi grag go/ ngan song rnams kyang skad do/
ngan 'gro rnams kyang med do// sdug bsngal yang med do// 'dzage rten gyi khams de na kha zas rags pa'i ng mang ngo// ma de dag thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi dga'
ba'i zas can no// mos pa rlabs po ches theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste/ de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med do// gang 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ma de dag thams cad kyang gsar gyi cod pan
thogs pa/ dpung rgyan dang rna chas brgyan pa lha' kha dog dang gzugs dang ldan par gyur pa sha stag go/ gang nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur pa de nyid de drag ga rab tu byung ba yin te/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gos ngur smag tu bka' stsal pa'i ng med de/ 'di ltar sems la rog ba med pa'i phyir ro// de bozhan gshegs pa de'ang
tshangs pa'i kha dog lta bu spyod lam rab tu zhi des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston to// dzages kyi bu gang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag kyang/ jatsam ldan
'das de bzhazhi gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la balhab dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhas rnam par bltas pa der lhags
[ro]te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'dong ngo// rigs kyi bu re bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par
dga' ba de nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston pa de na/ ta la brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas tshongs pa bkod pa'i sang ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos ston
torda/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de na nga ltar da ltar ng bzhin du mang du spros te rnam par phye bas chos kyi gtam ma ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de tshug dang yi ge nyung dus chos kyi
gtam ma dor ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni zur tsam gyis go ba sha stag ste/ chog gtsagi gas tshagi brgya stong gi rjes su 'jug pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang 'di lta
sgyu rda pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag ba dang//
sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ sbyor pa yongs su ngag pa bzhi po re ngag 'di byang chub sems dpa' dzAkon mchog sar mda' las brtsams te yang
dag par rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog sgor
mdas 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na mdzes shange skye bo mang po nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur zhes gsol to// de bzhin gshegs/
ka pa nges tshig de gnyis rgyas par rnam par bya ste bstan nas/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi blo thogs pa med pa na 'khor ba na mdzes so/

ny+tsA yongashes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa na skye bo mang po rdo bar 'tsho bar gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba des bstan pare lta bu bshad pa na/ byang
chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug cu chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob do// rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa 'dzage rten thams cad mngon par
dga' ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po dkon mchog skar mdas des yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na cung chub sems dpa' byang chuT kyi sAng
kho mdzes par bgyid la lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de khazhin gshegs pa 'jage rtan thams car mngon par dga' ba res byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po dkon mchog sa' mda' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to rogis 'u byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni byang chus kyi snying bo mdzes par byed pa'o/ de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/
[z/ ]ji tsam du chos rnams sgrub pa'o// chos rnams sgrub pa'i ng gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// 'as kyi bu gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' pag yod pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba tshad med ba mthar gtugs pas go cha rtsom pa tshad med pa dang/ sems can tshad med pa sdud pas sbyin pa ma zad barmad med pa dang/
mo lhod cing sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tshul 'chis kyis tshul khrims tshod med pa dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang du len pas bzod pa tshad med pa dang/ skyes bu dam pa'i
las kyis brtson 'grus tshad med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzan tshad med pa bsgrub pas bsam gtan tshad med pa dang/ chags ba med pa'i ng+ge shes rab kyis shes rab tshad med pa dang/ sems can
tshad med pas khyams pa tshad med pa dang/ pa na pa'i dngos pos snying rje tshad med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pas 'khor ba yongs su 'dzazhe la tshad med pa dang/ bdag
bde ba la ma chags pas sems can yongs su smane par byed pa tshud med pa dang da brtson 'grus brnyan pas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa tshad med pa dang/ yang dag par sbyoralas yon tan yang
dag par sgal cange sogs la tshad med pa dang/ yongashes tshad med pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa tshad med pa dang/ shes rab sbyor bas thos pa yongs su tshol ba tshad med pa
dad sems can gyi bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems la 'jug pa tshad med pa dud/ byams pa rjes bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo cad bsrungs pa la zhugs pa tshad med pa dang/ sems
bdu kho bas gon bal gnas pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs tshad med pa dad/ myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i a shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs tshad med pa ste/ dkon
'tsho mchog skar mda' chos 'di dag zhibag yod ba sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shag yod pa'i byang chub kyi snying bo mdzes bar byed pa'o// thugs kyi bu bag yod pa ni byang chub
la kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// bag yod ba na ba shesapa sgrub pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas so// bag yod pa ni dal ba'i chos bsags shing bsags pa rnams so sor yang dag par
'dzin par/ bag yod pa ni sngon thos pa'i rmos rnams chud mi gson ra 'o// bag yod pa ni bsnga bar bya ba'i chos rnams sdod pa'o// bag yod pa ni sgrib pa'i chos
rnams mi sdud pa'o// dgu tshod bzhi sgrib par mi 'gyur ba'i chos rnams rab tu 'dzin pa'o// thag yod pa ni ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa'o// bag yod pa ni dam pa'i
! ches yos su 'dzin pa 'bal bar byed pa'o// bag yod pa ni bang po rnams sdom par bye dga'o// bag yod pa ni lamanyam dag las kun tu srung ba'o// bag yod pa ni dus dang
dus ma yin pa spyod pa las skul ba'i ba ga yodapa ni stabs// stobs bcu yos su rdzogs bar byed par 'gyug go/ bag yod pa ni bril gyis mu na ste/ mi'ajigs
ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur// bag yod bzhi yon dod e shes dbag tu med pa 'byung gnas tA/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar byed yun 'gyur ro/
bag yod pa ni spyi bor phyin pa ste// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs bar byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshags pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon par dga' ba sa'adi lta bu bstan
ba dang/ byang chub sems dbang stong phrag bcu gnyis mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod ba rab tu thob par gyur to// rigasakyi bu de 'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog skar bdar gyur ba
dugazhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsomoza'am/ yid gs su rgyun zhu'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ gsakyi bu khyod nyid de'i tshade'i dusan byang chub sems
dpa' dkon mchog skar mdazhes bya bar gyur to// gsakyi bu khyod rnamagrus 'dis kyang ji ltar bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying bo mdzes par
byed pa dang/ de bzhi'i gshags bdagra bcom pa yang dag bas rdzogs ba'isangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub spyod bag yod bas thob par ga ban byago/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
grubya ]dba'i sems can yongs su smin bar byed ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhan/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste/
de bzhin du byung chub sa nas dba' sems can yongs su smin par byed ba'i spyodab yongs su dag pa'i ng mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams kyi bsam
dngashes nas/ samasacan rnams yongs susmin par byed nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta sams nasalal ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par 'gyur/ lal ni
wa tshul khrims snyadas pas/ sems can la la ni tshig gis shin tu gdams pas yongs su smin bar 'gyur/ la la ni 'dzam bas/ la la ni rtsub pos/ la la dganyis kas/ la la
ni 'jigs par byas pas/ lalani'ajigs pa las yongs su thar par byas pas/ la la ni bslangs pas/ lalani ma bslangs pas/ la larnaganod pas/ la la mi gnod
pas/ la la ni bril gyis mnan pa/sa/ lalan bril gyis ma mnan pas/ la lani sbyang bas/ la lan mi sbyang bas/ la la ni tshar bcad pas/ la la ni sbyin ba la phyir byin pa/sa/ la la
ni blangs pas/ sems can la lan yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs nye bar bsgrubs bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la lani sgra dang/ dridang/ ro dang/ reg pa dang/ chos yid du
bong ba nye bar bsgrugs pas yongs su sgren par 'gyur ro// sems can lal zhigazub/sa yid dumi 'ong ba nye bar bsgrubs pa sa yongs su smin par 'gyur po// sems can l la sgra dang/ dri dang/ lo dang//
rig pa dang/ sa yid du mi 'ong ba nyabar bsgrubasangs yongs su smin bar 'gyur de// sems can la lan spobs yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sems can la lani rtag tu mthongobs/ lal
mi mthong bas/ sems can la la ni sangs rgyas kyi sgras sems can la la ni chos kyi sgras/ sems can la la ni dga' dun gyi sgras/ la la ni mi rtag pa'i skyes//
pa la ni sdug bsngal gyi sgras/ galazhibadagabadagamad pa'i sgras/ 'alan zhi ba'i sgras/ samasacan la ni sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bgrod pa dang/ brtson 'grus
dad bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi sgras yongs su smin bar 'gyunar// sems can la lan sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug
bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i sgras yongs susmin par 'gyur ro// la la ni lha'i bde ba myong bar gyur ba'i sgras yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// soms can lal ni nyan thosakyi theg pa'i gtam
gyis lal ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyis/ la lan theg pa chen po'i gtam gyis yongasasusminapar 'gyur ro// sems n la la ni sbyin pas yongs su smin pas
'gyur gyi/ snyan par smra bsam yin/ don spyod pas ma yin// mthun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni snyan par smra bas yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi/
sbyin pas ma yin/ don skyong bas ma yin/ don mthun pas ma yin/ sems can la la ni don spyod nga sa ngos su smin par 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ snyan par skabs ma yin/ don mthun
rgyu bsam yin/ sems can la lan don mthun pas yongs susmin bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyin pas ma yin/ snyan bar smra bas ma yin/ ngon spyod pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yin/ sams
can la la ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sams snyan la la'i nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ la lan phyi rol gyi dngos po yas su gtong bas/
la la'i phyi dang nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong bas/ sems can la la ni chung ma dang/ bu pho dang/ bu mo kun tu gatong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur de// sems can 2la ni
rgyu ga pa dang/ rkad pa dang/ mig dang/ mgo kun tu gatong bas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// sams na la la ni rtsod ma dang/ dga' ba dang/ glu dang/ sil snyan gyis
yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// la la ni gcig tu bde sa/ la lan gcig tu sdug bsngal bas/ la la ni da gnyis kas/ la la ni gnyis ka ma yin pas/ sems can kha la
ni dge slong du sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems can lal ni dge slong dad/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bstan dud/ ga bstanamar sprul pas 'dul ba/ sems can l la zhi sangs rgyas kyi gzugs/
dang kha dog gis 'dul ba yin te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyigazugs dang sku bstan bas 'dul bar 'gyur ro// gas kyi bde 'byang chub sems dbas 'di ltar sems can gyi sbyong ba sna tshogs byed
ba shas nas/ sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su shes pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu rnam byang chub sems dang ba 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa las nges par 'byung bar gyur
cing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yang dag par bsdus par gyur te/ mngon par shes pa'i yo shes kyi sbyang pa la mkhas par gyur pa na// da nas gdod sems can yongs su
smin bar byed nus pa'i skal ba dang mthu yod par 'gyur ro// rigasakyi bu byang chub sems dbar chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/
bzhigang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su mi skyob dang/ bdag bde ba la ma chags pa dang/ dus dang dus ma yin par skul ba dang/ bsam pa yongs su shes pa lta/ rigs kyi
bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ soms can rnams yongs su smin par byed nusaso// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems ja' chos bzhi dang ldan na//
gsems can rnams yongs su smin par byer nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bkab bla bde ba dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ dang tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bzhin 'dzum zhing khraganyan
mad pa sta/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba mad pa'i sams dang/ snying rje chun po'i sams dang/ ban pa'i dngos po'i sems
dang/ bdag shin tu dul ba'i sams te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ samasacan rnams yongs su smin par byed nus sa// rigs
kyi bugazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed nus te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dag pa dang/ g.yo med
cing sgyu dang bral ba dang/ brtson 'grus brtan pa dang/ legs par byas pa dang/ nyisapar byas pa bgrad pa ste/ gis kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan n
samasacan rnams yongs su smin par byed nus so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang byang chub sems dpas yongs su mi skyo bas sems can rnams yongs su smin/
[c]/par byed nus par rig par bya'o/// gas kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs mad pa bas kyang ches rgyas chad pa// yangs ba/ rnam smad pa/ bsam gyis
mi khyab par gyur pa de'i mda'i dus na bskal pa dgab byed la 'jig rten gyi khamasazhi bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su
ldan pa// bdaba' gshags pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba 2 byan mad pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas gtsamaldan
'das dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams zhi bde'ang 'byor pa// rgyas pa// budab/ lo legs pa// nyams dga' ba/ lha dang

mis rab tu gad bdagyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma mad nga ra snang ba de'i nyan thos kyang nyan thos chen po bya ba phrug dgu bcu rtsa drug
'dus par gyur te/ 'di'i byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po'ang byang chub sems dapa' chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dus par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa drom mad par snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mo'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya ba
[# ]@#// gzugs bzad ba/ mdzes// blta na sdug pa// mdogabazang bo rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan ng//hig byung sta/ btsas nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang//
du gzugs bzad bdad/ longs spyod dang/ skyid pas drags shing nga rgyal skyes te rgyags nas/ bcom ldan 'dras rwa bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snangab de'i gan du ma 'gro/
stan par mi byed/ snyan bar mi byed/ rim gro ma byed do// rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de 'di snyam du ngagongs te/ ma la rgyal bu gzhon
nu nor dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin te/ byin mod ngang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par b+hAtshang rgya ba'i skalag yod na da gzugs dang/ las spyod
dang skyid pas rgyags dregs to/ da rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du'ang mi 'ong na/ gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bskul na ni/ de de bzhin gshags ba'i drung du 'ong yang srid
snyam mo// rigs kyi bu du nas rwa bzhin gshags pa dri ma med par snang ba dus byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag bsdus so// bsdus nas kyang rigs kyi bu dug khyod kyi nang
nas yid yongs su mi skyo bar labargyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rgyal bu gzhon nu zhes dpal gyi khyim gyi sgor 'gro zhing/ bde ba thams cad ni sbrangs/ sdug bsngol thams cad ni dad du blang te//

da las tha na kun tu smagatam/ yang dag bar sgrub bam/ stan tsam yang mi rlung kyi stang du gshargya zhing tshig ngan pa lcababo ma snyan pa zor yang spro bar 'gyur ba su yod ces tshul shing brimasas//
rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul shing khrims kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'bras byang chub sems dpar 'ga' tsam yang sprapar mgyur to// bcom ldan 'das des tshul/
shing thogs te lan gnyis lan gsum du brims kyad susakyad ma byas pa dang/ rigasakyi bud tshu byang chub sems dang/ 'a sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya ba zhig byed chub
sams dpa'i 'khor re nyung 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gabrar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
'as de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma mang bar snang bag la bar legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la 'di skad ces gsal
bcom ldan 'dus bdagani lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yid yas su mi skyo b.ru bde ba thams cad ni ljangs/ sdug bsngal thams cad ni ji mi snyam par bgyis te/ rgyal bu
gzhon nu nor dpal gyi khyim du mchi'o zhes/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chan po brtson 'grus 'bar gyis tshig de snas ma thag tu/ de nas danyid kyi tsho stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos nas/ lha'i bu brgya stong gis kyang stangagi bar snang las kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar
gyis brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di ni legs so legasas zhes bya ba byin no// rigs kyi bud nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dba' chen bo brtson 'grus 'bar de rgyal bu gzhon nu nar
dngal gyi khyim du song ste/ khyim gyi sgo drung na 'dug ba dang de skyaba'i tshogs chen po des mthong nas/ gshargya zhing dran pa rtsub pa sna tshogs sbas to[ ]dril sa dang rdul yang
gar/ de la lag pa dang/ dbyig pa dang/ bong bas kyang brdagasaso/ rus mthong zhing thong te/ lus lasog cing tshor bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar 'khrug
pa'i m/ gshab 'am/ khong khro ba 'am phyir log bar ma gyur kyi steng du btson 'grus brtan pa'i stobs rab tu bskyod nus/ stobs dang rab tu ldan padad/ snying rje chen bo'ang
bskyod de/ de la stong yin pa dang rgyal bo'i pho brang gi sgo khang gcig tu zhugs te/ smad pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ brdags pa thams cad kyis kyang yongs su mi skyo bar/ du la khro len

bdang rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang gnyis kyi nad du zhugs sa// da le nya khri len pa dang rgyal ba'i pho brang gi sgo khang gsum ba'i nang du zhugs pa nas lebadun khrilan ba dang/ rgyal bo'i pho brang gi sgo

khung drug pa'i nang du zhugs so// de labargyad khri bzhi stong len pa dung rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo khang bdun pa'i na da du zhugs pa dang/ de nas gdod rgyal bu gzhon zhu 'o dpal dus tshig ltar te/
jug slong khyed 'dod/ ci zhig tshol/ khyod laci dgosasmos shigadung/ nyinus kyis rab tu sbyin par bya'o// rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag slongad la ngo mtshar chen po'i/
'du shes skyas nas/ jitsam du dag slod rjes yongs su mi skyo ba rnaganus ba de ni ngo mtshar te skam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
brtson 'grus 'bar dus rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dang la de sams rab tu dud bar shes nas/ dgi tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bras dang skom dang gus dang bza' bsnums/
gzhon nu bdag la dgosabaci yong gad/ grang bying mad pa'i sams nyir bzhug nas/ bdag ni chos kyi pho nyar 'dir 'ongs so// 'jig rten don mdzad drang srong che/
byung ba// mi mchog dri ma mad par snang zhes bya/ de ni sdug bsngal mthar 'byin chos ston te// sems can gang gis thos pa mi mchi'athob// bskal pa stong phrag bye ba grangs
mod// sangs rgyas rnams ni nga rgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ltar 'jig rten mun nag sgron gyur pa// yon tan dam pa mnga' ba de skyes nas/ khyod ni 'di na 'dod ba'i yon tan
chags// gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rtag tu mos// skyid myos de bzhin rgyal srid myos pas na/ chos kyi rgyal po lta bar yod mi 'gro// longs spyod mi rtag 8 ]
bzhin rgyal srid srog/ rtsa rtsa'i la thigs 'dra las rgyal bas gsungs// gang phyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur ba// de ni rgyal bu khyod kyi rgya ma yin// khyodana' drin byang chub
mchog zhugs la// sems can dag kyang gnyer tu grolabar gyis// khyod bdagad ltar 'dod ba bran gyur na// ji ltar myos pas skyabo 'dul bar 'gyur// nga rgyal sdongs te rten
mongs rnams sal la// zhi rgyal ba'i drung 'gro bar gyis// brtson 'grusabaskyod de 'jig rten snying brtsa gyis// phyi ma'i dusazhu gdung bar gyur te ra// rgyal bus tshigs su bcad/
pa'i di thos nas// nga rgyal spangs te gus pa ba bskyed nas// brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te// gang sngon bdagagis gnang bgyis bzod par gsol//
bdagazhi rgyal srid thams cad sbangs bar bya// 'dod dang de bzhin longs spyod kun mi tshol// nga rgyal thuba'i skyon dang drags spangs te// myur du bad busu gshegs ba'i gan
du 'gro// don srog chagasabya ba brgyad cus bskor// ma tog nagaza' sngos dang bdug pa thogs// dri ma mad par snang ba skyes bu mchog/ rgyal ba de yi drung du'u bar song//
bdabar gshegs pa'i gan du phyin nas kyang// zhabs la phyag 'tshald nas mchod byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa de yi spyan sngar 'dug/ rgyal bud yis tshig ni 'di sbas so//
gang phyir skyo mdasams kyis bskul thus na// brtson 'grus 'bar babadagagi ston pa mgon/ ji lta'adi ni gad pa'i 'os lags na// du la lan du phan pa bgyi mi
nus ba dag ni 'jig rten mgon labazod pan gsol// chos kyi rgyal la gus ba gdu ma bgyis// de dag thams cad de ring so sor bshags// bdag gis nongs
pa 'jig rten mgon mkhyen mdzod// sems can don du snying rje bskyad nas su// bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te// byang chub dam mchog ma thob bar duni// snyan
da bag med spyod bami bgyi'o// rgyal bud yis rgyal srid rnams spangs te// sems can bye ba brgyad cu rnams kyis bskor// byang chub dmapa 'di ni yongs rtsol zhing// mngon byung rgyal
ba'i bstan la rab tu byung// rgyal bas de dag gin bsamamkhyen nas// byang chub lam mchog rab tubastan pas na// chos thogs sems can rtag tu dag ba rnams// thams cad kyis
kyang rjes mthun bzod pa thob// yigs kyi bu sa bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par de bzhin gshags padri mamad par snang ba 'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi bsngags pa brjod cing/ gang chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyad yon tan gyi mthar bod par mi 'gyur ro// rigasakyi bu de'i tshad ni dus//
na byang chubu sams dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin ba snyam du dogs shing the tshom bu 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na'ang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de'i tshe de'i dusan nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya ba dar gyur to// rigs kyi bu da'i cha da'i dusan rgyal bu gzhon nu ma dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa sAm du
dogs shing the tshom za bam/ yid gnyis su gyur na 'ang de ltar mi blta'o// daci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dang// sems dpa' rnan po byams pa 'di ni de'i tshe dra'i dusan/
rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyibu de ltar sngon byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo zhing/ 'di ltar shin tu
stobs dang ldan to/ brtson 'grusanye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu du bsan pyad chub samasadapa' sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'dod pas/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
brtson 'grusa'abar zhes bya ba de ltar bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin no// rigs kyi
bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byad chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ bdud kyi las shin
tu 'da' ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba byang chub sams dpa'i las dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang/ sangs
rgyas kyis thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa byang chub sams dpa'i las te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dgazhi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dba'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dba' rnams kyi byang chub sems dba'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhista/ bzhi gang zhe
nu ba sam pa la 'jug ba'i yashes dang/ bad po yongs su shes pa'i ya shes dang/ nad thams cad zhi bar byed par sman sbyin pa'i yashes dang/ nyon mongs pa'i nyid thams cad rab tu
zhi bar byed pa mi 'khrugs pa'i ya shas te/ rigs kyi bu bzhi po de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud
par 'gyur ba'o/// de nas byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po gtsugan rin po ches gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs mad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon
par grub pa// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu nor bu ni po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkadu bus kyang yin du mi bzod pa'i gtsugagi nor bu na
ba med/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdagagigatsug na mchis pa'i nor bu na po ma 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba
'dis bcom ldan 'das bdag sbe gtsug ltar mi snang ba thob pa dang/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes spyi bar gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang ldan par gyur cig/
n gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis da'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ nam 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na/ bgaldan 'das kyi zhal gyi
sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ khadog sna tshogs 'di lta sta/ sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ ladang/ dngul gyi 'dog lta bu byung sta/ de
dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa de dag 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ rlab dang nyi ma rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang
gzi brjid kyis yongs su zad par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'dasal lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyigatsug tu nub par gyur to/
da nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'dasal tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus so// mi mnyamamanyam pa dam pa 'jig rten mig sbyin
'jig rtena mchog/ shAkya'i rgyal sras dbang po na zhing dri gsum dri ma spangs// mtshungs mad mtshungs 'das byams pas 'phags pa rgyal ba'i rab bzhin// ci slada'a'i 'dzum
ma shes 'byung gnas bdag la lung bstan gsol// thugami mnga' ba du mnyen la shin tu snyan pa'i gsung// skyasabu dam pabad ba sbyin nga dran mchog blo gros thugs// bde gshegs
mos pa mchog dang ldan pa lha dang mis mchod ba// ci slad ba dzum pa 'di mdzad phan pa mdzad pas bstan du gsal// stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' 'dom gang 'od dang bsod nams
gzi brjid do// 'khor gyi nang du sang ga lta bur rab gasgrags rgol ba bcom// thub pa srid gsum khyod dang mnyam pa 'am lhag pa gang yang med// chos kyi dbang phyug ni slad
'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan du gsol// rab tu bzhad cing mchog tu dgyes ba shin tu dri mad zhal// zla ba lta bu nam mkhar gshegs nas phyogs su lam ma bar// un pa/ ]
bcom dardulabcoma'od dad dang lan rab rgyas pa// bdu bar gshegs pa 'dzum mdzad phan pa mdzad bas bka' stsol cig/ gsana'i 'od 'dra brtul zhugs grub
ba bsod nams ye shes 'phro// mkhasapas rtag tu rang bsngags 'ag rten ngo mtshan mchadang 'i 'os// srid pa'i dmapa 'jig rten 'das pa sbyin gnas mi zad cing// nam
mala'i rjes rab snang bar pashAkya sangags 'dzum pa bstan// lha dang mis mchogakhyod 'dra sadang lha yul dganabad mad// yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yod dpal gyis rab tu
rgyas yon tan brgya rnams shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa// bde gshags 'dzum pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig/ kun tu khyod kyi yashas dus
gsum chags pamed par 'jug/ sams dang yid sbyor dbang po gang dang sems can bsamapa gad// sems can kun gyi bsam pa'i 'dra thams cad skad cig mkhyen//
gi yisang gas gang mang 'dzum mdzad gas don bdag lagasungs/ nam mkhar gnas pa'i lhamad yid kyang rab tu dga'// mi tshogs sa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshalagyis//
gang thos lha mimun pa'i rdul rnams sal 'gyur ba// mi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi mchog dbyabar gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis byang chub
sams dpa' sams dpa' bo spobs pa myur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dang gtsugan na pa ma 'dis sangs rgyas kyi yi shes lci bar gyur
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'id du/ gang gtsug gi nor bus po cha 'di de bzhin gshags pa la phul ba mthod ma/ gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong dro//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byed chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsugan rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad
mnyes par byas/ bsti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mor byas shing/ mchod nas/ thams cad du'ad tshadas par sbyod pa spyad d/ sems can dpag tu mad pad dag
kyad theg ba gsum po de dag la yongs su smin par byas so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sams dpa' gtsug na rin po che 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong na bskal pa dri ma med nga
la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par/ rnga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig
rten mkhyen pa/ spyas bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo//
'jig rten gyi khams bod dri ma med padi'i sa gzhin yin pa rmi sna bdun du ba gyur pa// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas khyod gang byung ba sa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
yod ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// 'od da' da gsar gyi bdag lta bu n 'gyur de// sams tshan gang dag 'od des rtag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang nyon mngasapa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur
'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri mamad pa de'ang 'byor nga rgyas pa// byang chub sems dapa' 'ba' zhigaga gnas su 'gyur ro// der byang chub sems dpa' rin po che ma gtogs par na
na po chagazhanu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa da mid rin po cha'abyung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dang 'a de dag thams cad kyang mngon nga rashes pa rab tu 'thad
par 'gyur ro// di dagagi longs sbyod dad kun sbyod pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bla
na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu des bar ban re// da mi khem pa dadadan song rnams kyi ming yang med par 'gyur ro// de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshagasab na
! bam byung ba bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal bo ma gtogs pa'i rgyal po gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na
bud mod dang 'khrig cing 'du ba'i ming yadamad par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de nas ms can long ba 'am/ zharab 'am/ zhabo 'am/ sgur po 'am/ yan lag ma tshad bar 'gyur
bgang yang med de/ dedag thams cad kyang lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshags ba pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dbag tu mang bar 'gyur
pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa bar mabazhi bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa// pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ snying
rje chen po dang rab tu ldan// thog brgya pa dang rab tu ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyurar// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang dbang po rnaste cu tsam gyis go bar/
'gyur ro// de dag kyang chos kyi sgo'i tshig re res sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par 'gyur te 'dabazhin gshags ba de'ang byang chub sems dapa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi
gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug ba'o// tshig gcig pu
de'ang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ tshig mi zad pa'o// tshig mi zad pa de'ang gang zhen/ ga mi thad pa zhes bya ba ni gang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyisakyang zad par byed nus ba'o/
dmig mi zad pa de'ang gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ a zhes bya ba ni tshig mi zad pa lta/ a zhes bya ba la zhugs// yig 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro//
da ltar na yi ge thamasacad ni mi zad pa ste/ yi ge 'bru gnyis snga phyi med par shes par bya minus so// yi ga 'bru la rigs brjod kyi/ yi ge'ang yig gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin na/ 'di bsan tshig
gcig pu de nyid rnam par rig pa'i tshigs/ gad rnam par rig pa'i tshig dbang rnam par g ba'i tshig ces rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed do/ 'di ltar tshig de mi rtag rnam par
mi rtog bar dgos pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'agagyi gabrusal ba jug pa'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa rin po cha'abyudabad/ byang chub sems/
dung ba de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag bar sha tu ston par bgyur ro// rigs kyi bu des bskal pa'i m/ bskalapa lasalhag par 'jig rten gyi khamasa'od drim mdab pa'i bsngags/
pa brjod cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom par yang gapar rdzogasapa'i sangs rgyas nango tsha'abyung ba'i chos bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod kyang/ yon tan
yongs su brjod pa zad par mi 'gyur tu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon ska gyi rnam par bkod patshod tshad bde snyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sams dpa'
bsamasadapa' chen po gtsug na rin po chas bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ dga' mguyiras shing rab tu dga' ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul da
mthun pa'i tshigasasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// chos rnams kun gyi pha rolagashogs// 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams
bums cad las// de bzhin gshags pa shin tu 'das// yoshesamanabo khyod re 'chor// sasasabye bde skadal// bdag gis sngon mchod gang bgyid nga//
du dag thams cad mngon par mkhyen// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang// de bzhin da ltar byung ba yi// bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du// srog chags kun gyi rab tumkhyen// thub pa ni
'dra de 'dra bas// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdugalung bstan// bdag ni bu tshom yong ma mchis// sa rnams thams cad 'gas kyang gda'// nyi zla
mkha' las ltad yang gda'// bcom ldan khyod kyi zhal sgo nas// phyin ci log gagasung mi 'phyud// yaMshesaldan la shes rab che/ 'dasani bdag la bden ga gis// byang chub
mchog tu lung bstanangs// sangs rgyas blan mdang/ra 'gyur// thugs kyis ying ni mkhyen pas na// bdag gi spyod pa 'dra dang// sangs rgyas zhing yang mi 'dra ba// de 'dra nyid
thatshom ma mchis dbang po tshim// somasacan rnams la phan pa'i rgyun// mchog gi spyod ba spyad par bgyi//
[+ ]bdagagi spyod pa mi 'dra ba// sngon gyi mtha' ni rnam sbyangs ba/ dad bsashin tu dbag yas pa// bdagagi spyodab spyad par bgyi/ 'di ni la las mi 'da' bas// brtson 'grus pa/
tsho pa'i spyod pa'i di// zhum pa ma mchis soms kyis su// byang chub spyod pa spyad par bgyi// bdag ni byang chub lung bstan pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni sprab stsal// ji sring 'dren ba ma gyurang//
zla de srid brtson 'grus mi gtang ngo// rtag tu byung chub mchog gzhol te// samasacan thams cad gtor bar bgyi// byang chub dam pa don du btsalo// de dag bdag gis bskyang bar
bgyi khyod chub sams dpa' gtsugan rin pa chos tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'dishadu pa/na/ srogachags stod phragabadun cu rtsa gnyis byan mad pa yang dag par rdzogasaba'i
byang chub dusamasabaskyod nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma mad par skye bar sams kyis smon te/ tshiga'adi skad cas bcom ldan 'das rnam de bzhin gshags
pa rin po che 'byung ba des byang chub thob par gyur padan/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyabar gyur cig ces smras pa dang/ de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyo bar lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'angs kyis tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo masakyi rnam grangs 'di zung
zhig chodas shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub bar gyis shig ga zhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am//
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chu kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad dam/ klog pa dpag ni bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tung lung ston to// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/
gas kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la lo stod duci bzhed zas sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu ma/ gas/
kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mas te/ 'chad ngam/ klog gam/ de kho na bzhin du thun tan byed na/ 'din de bas bsod zhums rmasamangalta/ tshad
mad gras mad par khong du chung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tsho dud ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad cas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdagagis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
gzung lags na// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi
@#// rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar yang thung zhig/ gtsug na rin po ches/
zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dang nyasams dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che dang 2 byad nub
soms dpa' de dag thams cad dang/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo dad lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/dri bar bcas ba'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchogabartsigs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangasale'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa gtsugan rin po chas zhus pa zhes bya ba'i
le'u sta/ 'dusapa bakha bcu bdun pa rdzogasas/// zhu chen gyi latso ban d+ha rma shAlas zhus te/ skadagasar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
glo ka dgubargya sta/ bam po gsum mo// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+him la de ba sing ha danAm ma hA ya na sU tA/ bod skad du/
'phags ba lha mo dang lab phrangagi sang ga'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mad// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol la//
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ 'di nas pa'i tshe
yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang/ btsun mo dam pa btsun ma 'phrang ldan mas/ lha mo dbala'aphrang chos rtogs nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar skabs su gtam rgyas pa//
rgyal po chen po kya ma khyod kyi srasamo lham dang la 'phrad ni mdzangs shing gsalal/ bgacingamakhas te/ gal tas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba lta na/ tshugs chung ngus rmasartogs
la bam ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la'ang the tsamam marnyes par 'gyur ro// ri nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis btsun/ 'phrang ldan m la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phrang
ldan ma bu bu cag gis lha mo dong la'aphrang la pho nya zhus pa zhig gtangagaram chagage/ de skad ces smras pa dud/ btsun mo 'phung ldan masargyal po gsal rgyal gyi tshig de mnyan nas/
ko sa la'i rgyal pogasal rgyal dad/ btsun mo 'phrang ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rnam pa dum bris te/ nang kor mayid brtan pa zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba
kun dga' ba'i gtam byas te/ lham dpal 'phrang gi lag tu 'phrin yig byin no// 'dunasalha med pal 'phrang gis pha ma la gus bas 'phrin yig
de lag pa gnyis kyisabyas nas go la gtugs te/ bdag nyid kyis 'phrin yigabakragasanas/ 'phrin yig gi don bzung ngo zhes sa par bzung// don du des nga la bzung nas/
@# mgo la lcags rta/ ya mtshan du bzung nas/ lha mo dpal 'phrang gis nang kon ma zla ba lta bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sangs rgyas zhes bya'i sgra'adi ni/ 'jig rten dag
shin du dkon// gal tatshig 'di bden gyur na// bdag gis khyod la bgo ba sbyin// gal tabcom ldan sangs rgyas do// 'jig rtan don du byung gyur na// don bdag la thugs rje
yis// bstan pa'i ched du 'dir spyon cig/ de nas de yi skad cigal// mgonapa gshags nas mkha' la bzhugs// bsamagyis mi khyab sangs rgyas sku// 'od gror 'gyod
cing bzhugs pa mthod// de nas de'i tshe lha mo na// gus pasa 'khor bcas las nas kyang// sri bar thal ma sbyar byas nas// lcaba'i mchog la bstod pa// mgon
pakhyod kyi sku gzugs dang// dpal dpagang na'ang yod ma mchis// bsam yas dbo zla ma mchis pa'i// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po khyad kyi skugazugs dang/
[2/ ]ya shas la yang bsam ma mchis// khyed kyi sangs rgyas sa mi bas// de bas thub byed skyabs kyad lags// bsam yas rtsal ldan khyod kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams
bsal// nyamasamamachis pa'i sa gnas pa// sargyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes bya thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen/ da yo shos skayaM dbang phyug ste/ sangs rgyas
chos rnams thams cad kyi// mthar phyin khyad la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhal yas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dab las 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam yas chos khyad phyag/
'tshal lo// mtha' yas gzugasakhyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni da ltar mgon pos bskyabs// byang chub sa bon rnam par bsgyur// slan chad srid pa gzhan dag tu//
thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngon tshe rnams su lhamo khyod/ ngas ni byang chub sbyor ba byas// phyis kyang tshe rabs
gzhan dag tu// dus ni rjes su gzung bar bya// lha mo dpal phreng gis gsol pa// bdug gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu// bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa//
bsad nams de yis mgon po khyod// rtagatu bdag gis mthong bar shog/ de nas lha med pal 'phrad dang lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis// bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so// de nas bcom ldan bas kyis 'khor ba dus ba'i nad du lha mo dbal 'phrang bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lham khyod kyis de bzhin gshags pa la yang dag ba'i yon tan dag gis mngon par bstod pa'ibasod nams bsags pa gang yin ba'i dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis lha mo/
khyong bskal pa tshad med grangs med par lha dang mi'i rgyal srid bun sum tshogs la myong bar 'gyur to/ tsha bas thams cad du'ang da mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing/ nga la
mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu mad grangs med pa rnams la'ang mchod pa byed par 'gyur
no da phyin chad bskal ba brgya stong phragagrangs med pa yun khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar
'gyur te/ de'i tshul ng lha mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing derangan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas
par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag la nad kyang med// rga ba'ang mad/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa'i ng med de/ mi ga ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyi ming yang mi
[4]grag par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing derasems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbad byed kyi lha rnams kyad 3di ltar bde ba dang/ gzugs dang/ kha dog ngang/
dpal dad/ gzi brjid dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ rig bya dad/ las sbyong thams cad kyis bril gyis gnon par 'gyur tu/ sems can
da jagashAn tu bde ba dang ldan bar 'gyur ro// lharma sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sams na gang dag 'byung bdu dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro//
lta ma de bzhin du dga'i rtsa ba dag byas pa'i samasacan rnams de'i tshesangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'du bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha ma dbala'aphrang gis lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos
nas ltadad mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lamabatab bo// de dag thamasacad kyang 'jig rtan gyi khams der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung/
bstan to// de nas lha mo dpal 'phrang gisabcom ldan 'das las mngon sum dubadaganyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ thal mo sbyar tu yi dam chan po bcu yang dag par
byas so// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltasta/ bcom ldan 'das de sman chad bdag gis tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems baskyad par mi bgyi// bcom
ldan 'das yi dam dang pa 'di'i byang chub kyi snying bat+ta mthar thugagi bar du bdagagis yang dag par byang ngo// bcom ldan 'dus da slan chad bdag gis bla ma dag la ma gus
[+ ]pa'i sams bskyed pa mi bgyi sta/ bcom ldan 'das yid maganyis pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying pa'i mthar thugagibar du bdag gis yang dag par byed de/ bcom ldan 'dusad than
tsho[/ ]chad bdag gis gang du'ang sems can la khro bo dang/ gnod samasakyi samasabaskyad par mi bgyi lta/ bcom ldan 'das yid magasum pa 'di'adu byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug
gi bar du bdagagis sa dadag par blang ngo// bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang/ gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs bdag la phrag dog gi sems bskyed par mi
bgyista/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bzhi ba 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying bo'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo// bcom ldan 'das de sman char bdag gis thon kham
slad matsam pabang sor sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam lha pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdagagis yang dag par blang ngo//
bcom ldan 'das da sman chad bdagagis bdag nyid kyis longs spyod pa'i slad du nur yongs sugazung bar mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'as sems can dbul po sdug bsngal zhing
[e ]mgon ma mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su gzung bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das mi dam drug pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying pa'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang
gang na byang dang// bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bsngaba'i dngos po bzhisasems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa na/ bdag la sman du ba'i slad du sems ma bsdu bar
mi bgyi lta/ 'on kyang bam ldan 'das zang zing ma mchis pa'i sa mos dang/ rnag par mi 'dzin pa dad/ ldog pa ma mchis par sems can yang dag par bsdu bar ba la nga/
bcom ldan 'das yi dam bdun pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying pa'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo// bcom ldan 'das da slan chadabadag gis sems can mgon ma mchis/
pa dang/ go ras stsalab dad/ bcings pa dang/ nad kyis nyam thag bu dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ dbul po dad/ 'phongs par gyur pa dang tshogs chen pos 'tsho ba dug
mthong na/ de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcig kyang dor bar mi bgyi'i/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na/ sngag
bsngal de dang de dag las yongs su thar par bgyis la/ nor gyi bsdu bsang sgrubs nas/ slad kyis bdag mchi bar bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam brgyad pa rdodi'ang
[n/ ]@#// byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdagagis yang dag bar byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das du slan chad bdag gis thaga'atshong dang/ byab la sogs pa sdig pa'i las
kyis 'tsho zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i chos 'dulabalas nyams pa'i tshul can dag mthong na yal bar mi dor gyi/ bcom ldan 'das grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong
[% ]la dad/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang dag na bdag gi mtshid nyan pa de dang de dag tu tshar dgum pa'i rigasab rnams la ni tshar dgum/ snyan gdags ba'i rigs pa
rtsa rnams la ni smanag drags par 'tshal lo/ 'di ci'i slad du zhe nA/ bcom ldan 'das tshan dgum pa dang smanagadagasabs ni 'jig rten du dar ba'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i slad du sta/
dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas na lha dang mi rnams kyi lus rnam bar baphal bar 'gyur zhing/ ngan song rnams yongs su'agrib par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bcom ldan
'dus kyis chos kyi 'khor lobaskor ba'i rjes su skor bar bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam dgu pa 'di'ang byang chub kyi snying ba'i mthun thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag
par blad ngo// bcom ldan 'dasar slan chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos bzung thalas bskyed par bgyi ba'i soms gcig tsam yang bskyad pa bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
[s] bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos bazung ba las bskyang n theg pa chen po bskyad par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das thog pa chen po bskyadan ba rol tu phyin pa bskyud par 'gyur ro// bcom
ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa bskyadan thog ba chen po la mi 'dun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen bo gang theg pa chan bo la ma nges pa de ni dam
pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la u0f7cmi 'dun par 'gyur zhing/ rang nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni phyis pa so so'i skya bo'i sar mchiba'i skal ba can du 'gyur
bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdagagisanyes dmigs dang gnodapa chen por mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni/ bdag dang
ma 'ongos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dang/ ga tu ma mchis pa'i don yongs su grub par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'dus rnam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i yi dmabcu pa
'di'ang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du dug gis yang dag par blang ngo// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yid m chon po bcu po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
sngar blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi rdzanyid bdagagi dbang du gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das ston pa mngon sum du gyur tu lag kyang/ somasacan dgopo'i rtsa
ba chung du la la dag kyi ma yi dmachan po bcu po 'di dag ni lcogs par dka'a'o shAm du bdag la the tsom ba 'am/ yid gnyis 'tshol ba de dgazhi/ bcom ldan
'das danyid kyis yun ring por gnodapa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ phung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'dasar dganyid la sman gdugs pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
spyan sngar bdun pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'di bgyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'dasabadag gis yi dmachen po bcu bo gang dag blangs pa'i yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dgal/ bcom ldan
bas gal te bdag ji skadaskyasapa de bzhin du bgyid bar 'gyur ba rten/ bcom ldan 'dasabadagagi bden pa'i chig bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir lha'i ma tog gi char 'bab
bar gyur cig/ lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig gdosakyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs 'de len par gyur cig/ lham dpal 'brang gis tshig de skad ces smras ma
thag tu/ nga tsho lha'i ma tog gal chen po bab nas/ bar sdang las lha'i sgra grag par gyur to/ des bden pa'i phyin gyisabarlabs du mnosanus/ lha mo de de bzhin
ni/ ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no zhes byas so// de nas rmad du byung ba'i cho'aphrul de rang mthong/ lha'i
sgras mnos pa deb thos nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thu tsom mad cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo dbalar phrang dang mi 'bral zhing bgrogs bar smon lam btab bo//
'khur de thams cad kyang dra bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'athatsam ldan 'dus kyis lung bstan to// de nas lha mo dbala'aphrang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam
chen po gsum tab pa// gsum gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden paa'i byin gyis brlabasa'adis sems can dpag tu mamachis pa dag la sman
btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tshor bas thams cad du dam pa'i chos rtogs pa thob bar gyur
cig bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen ngo dang pa lags so// bcom ldan 'adus bdag gis dam pa'i chos rtogasapa da thob nas kyang/ dal ba dang
yongs su skyo ba ma mchis par sems can rnams la chos ston bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsab lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de'ang lus dang srog la mi lta bar dumo ba'i chos bsrung ba dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs sugazung bar 'atshalalo// bcom ldan 'dasabadin
bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'dabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo
dang la'aphrang gi sman lam chen po yul rgyab gsum po 'di dag lung ston pa mdzad de/ lha mo 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad zhinam mkha'i khams kyi khongs
su 'dus shing/ khos su gtogs la/ khongs su chud de// lha mo de bzhin du byang chub soms dpa'i smon lam gang+gA'i klungag bye ma snyed dag kyang/ smon lam chan
sgyu pa 'di gsum gyi khongs su 'dus shing/ khongs su gtogs la// longs su chud// smon lam chen po gsum pod dguni da ltar yul che'o// dunas bcom ldan 'das la lha
mod la 'phrang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la smo na lam chen po'i yul bstan ba gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gis spobs so//
bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// lha ma khyod la de bzhin gshegs bsaganang gis/ khyod spobs bar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma dpal 'phrang
gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su
[z}]bzung ba'i smon lam chen po gcig gi khos su 'dus shing/ khongs su chud de/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yul chub lags so// de nas
bcom ldan 'dus kyis lha mo dbal 'thud la legasas zhes bya ba byin te/ lham legs so legs so// lha mo khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ thabs kyis yongs su
bsgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no// lha mo sems can gang dag khyod kyis chos bstan pa'i don rtogs ba de dag ni dkon pa yin te/ yun ring bo nas sangs rgyas du ma la dge ba'i rtsa
ba bskyod bskyod pa yin na// ltam khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongasasu gzung ba bstan pa ji skada bshad pa de bzhin du/ 'das pa dang/ ma'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i du bzhin
gshogs pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba bstan par nyida bshad do// 'chad do// 'chad par 'gyur ro// lha mopa' da da ltar mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob
nasadam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa rnam bdunub ston to/ lha ma de ltar dam pa'i chos yos su gzung ba bstanapa sa rnam pa du mar bshad kyang/ dam ba'i chos yongs su 'dzi
ba'i yon tan rnams kyi mtha' bam/ mu thug pa mdad// de bzhin gshegs ba'i sbobs pa la'ang mtha' 'am/ mu thug pa med do// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su
'dzin pa ni de ltar don che'o// lha mo dmapa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni da ltar phan yon che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'brang gis 'di skad ces
ka gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen bo bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha mad de'i
b+he dus la bab par shes na khyod sdobs bar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal 'brang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin ban sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
yongs su 'dzin bzhi chos kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong sdud ga lags so// bcom ldan 'das deba' na' chagasaba'i dus kyi rma'i sprin chen po ni badrag mtha' yas pa sa ba'i rgyun dang/
zhe po ma mtha' yas pa'i rgyun dad ldan bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yodas su 'dzin pa'i ng bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i chab kyi rgyun dpag tu ma
mchis pa dang// yo shasazhin bo tsho'i rgyun dpagatumamachis pa dang ldan pa lags so/// bcom ldan 'das dpar na chags pa'i dus kyi tshe'i chab kyi phung po chen po stod
gsum gyi stong chan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skya gnas de lasani gling bzhi pabyab phrag brgya kha dog sna tshogs pa dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing/ 'khor gling phran bye ba

brgya phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi chab kyi phung pon bo de lasa'abyung ngo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa thogab chen ngod yang dgapar 'grub pa'i 'byung khung dang skya gnas su
gyurapa de las byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul bathAms cad dang/ chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams
cad dad/ 'jig rtan las 'das pa'ibad pa lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma myong bgad lags ba thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dbar na sa chen po ni khur chen po/
bzhi'i rtan bgyid pa lags te/ bzhi bo de dgagang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chab kyi phung bo chen po rgya mtshodang/ mi mang bo thams cad dang/ gnas dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gal
ba dud/ sman dang/ lo togadang/ nags chol thams cad dang/ sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi rten bgyid du/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chan po bas kyang khur chen pa//
bzhi ba 'di dag gi rtan bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pazhis chanapo bas kyang mas khur chen po
bzhi khyer ba lags so// bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can dag pa'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing thos pa dar ma wan la/ sa
can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i kun sum tshogs pa 'thob par brgyad pa'i rig pa'i rtsa ba dag la sbyor ba ni sa chen po las kyang ches khuran po khyer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi thog pa la sbyor bar brgyud pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyor ba lags so// rigs kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can
kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyud pa ni sa chen po pas kyang chos khur chen po khyer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen
bo la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag ni khur chen po lags so/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/
gis kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni khur chen po 'di bzhi khyer ba lags te// sa chen po bas kyang ches rtan du gyur pa dang/ sa chen po bas kyang skyes khur chen po khyer
lci ba dar/ khur mthar yas pa khyer ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du gyur pa dang/ byams pa bgyis pa dang/ snying rje can dang/ sman par 'tshal ba dang/ sIng
brtse ba dang/ chos kyis 'jig rten rgya ma zhes bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na sa chen po na rin po che sA bzhi'i 'byung gnas lags te/ sa bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/
rin po rin thang ma mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang/ rin po cherin thang mchis pa dag gi 'byung gnas dang/ni po che dngas chung ba dag ga 'byung gnas rang/rin po ched bas kyar chung
ba dag gi 'byung gnas lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sa chan po ni po che sa bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtan nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po ma'i mchog chan bo rin po cha thams cad kyi dam par gyur pa bzhi'i kha rAd par 'agyur ro// bzhi
gang zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rigs kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo de la brtan nas/ sems can rnams kyis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par brgyad pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
kyi khe nAr par 'gyur ba dang/nyan thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba thub par bgyi ba rnyed par gyur ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i drag pa'i rtsa
ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ches mthon po thog mar brgya ba snyad
bar 'gyur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtan nas/ sems can rnams kyis rin po/
cho thams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rin po chen po bzhi'i kha nad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gter chen po rin po che mtha' yas pa'i 'gyur gnas zhes bgyi ba/
spyi de ni dam pa'ichos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshog bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom
ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'adas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i
chos lags so// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa pord gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i
chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pa rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni
sems can gang dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongs su snyan par brgyad de/ tha na lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong bas kyang yongs su
smin par bgyid de/ de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas par gyur ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems
can gang dag tshul khrims kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang po drug bsdams pa dang/ lus dar/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pas yongs su smin
par bgyur ra/ man spyod lam gyis kyang de dag gi sems sung zhing yongs su snyan par bgyid de/ de dag de lta de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur
ba 'di ni dar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bzor pas yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag la ni de dag gis/
de la sgros brgyad de gtso ba bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis shang snyan par 'ats+tsal pa dang/ bzod pa'i stobs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/
tha na bzhon gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sams srung zhing yongs su smin par 'gyod de/ de dag yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni ri'i
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su snyan par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems ma zhum zhing le lo ma
mchis pa dang/ 'dun pa chen po dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su sAn par bgyid de/ tha na rang gi spyod lam bsgoms pas kyang re/
dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par 'gyod de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi spyi rol tu phyin pa/
lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni si mas mo g.yang ba dang/ yid phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang/
dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na bgyis nas yun ri du lags pa dang/ sas nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskyod pas kyang de dag
go sams srung zhing yongs su smin par brgyad de/ de dag de ltar yongs su san+ni par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyis rol tu phyin pa/
lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dgu la le lam mchis par lung ston pa
dang/ bstan bcos thams cad dang/ rig pa dang/ bzo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/tha na bzo grwa'i gnas chen po dag tu'ang de dag gi
sems srung zhing yongs su snyan par brgyade de/ de dag de ltar yongs susAn par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//
bcom ldan 'das de lta lags khas/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzani pa po'ing gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos
yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis
sobs go khacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ lha mo re bzhin gshegs pas gnar gas/ khyod kyis slobs par gyis shig de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo/
rapal 'phrang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam par chos yongs su 'dzin pa po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi ba na bcom ldan 'das dam
pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i ng gzhan ma lags la/ ra ma pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po'ang gzhan ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i
chos yongs su 'dzin pa lags so// deci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzan pa des ni/ bcom ldan
'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du yan lag gsum yongs sugatong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar lus dang/ sog dang/
longs sbyong rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i ma'i sku dang mnyam pa/ rma kha/
dang na bo dang/ 'ad+meb dang bral la// mi shigs pa/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ zhi ba/ ther zug pa// 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mthar yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa thob
par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo srog yongs su gtong bas ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul bar gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu
ts+tso/ dang mnyam la 'amyi'i po dang bral ba// mtha' yas pa// rtag pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa ltar ldan pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu ram/
rigs kyi bu mo longs sbyor yongs su gtong bas na sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa 'khor pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang mnyam pa// sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags
pa/bas par ma 'gyur ba// rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rtag par rgyun ma'amad tsang rtag tu gnas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur
ro/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gos kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzani pa yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs su gtong bas ni/ yon tan shin tu rmad du byung
ba gsum po de dag thob par 'gyur to/ sangs rgyas thams cud kyang lung ston par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i chos rnam par M
'jig pa'i tshe/ dag slong dar/ dge slong ma dar/dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams bye zhing gnyis su gyur la/ sde sngarachad de/ phyogs phyogs su gyes nas rtsod par
gyur pan/ g.yo ma mchis shing/ gya gyu ma mchis la/ skya mamanyis par chos la dga' zhing/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos can gyi phyogs la 'dzug par bgyid/
na bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las lung bstan pa des par 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i
chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni da ltar brtson 'grus chen po lags pa snyam bdag bgyid de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyir san du gyur pa lags te/ yoshes su gyur ba lags/ bcom
ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mngar bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasaM kyis lha mo dpal 'phro
gis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ lha mo de de bzhin te/ lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni brtson 'grus/
chen po yin// lha mo dperan mi stobs dang ldan pas gnad du mi drag par bastan du zin kyang/ snad par 'gyur zhing/ nad skyed par byed do// lha mo re bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs
su 'dzin pa ni chung du zin kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan skyed laM/ sa sngags 'don par byed do// lha mo ngas ni bdud sdig can la dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ji
ltar gnod par 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan skyed la/ sbe sngags 'don la ma phyed pa de ltar gnod par 'gyur ba dang/ de ltar mya ngan spyod pa dang/ de ltar se sngags 'don par byed pa'i dag pa'i chos
gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ngo// lha mo dper ni ba lang gi mchog khyu mchog gis ni 'di ltar 'phang mthong dang mu'ang gis ba langag tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ mngon par
brjid cing yang dag par mngon par brjid do// lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i ng rlung du zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang/ rgya chen por gyur pas/
nyan thos dang/ nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos tham sa cad thal gyis gnon to// lha mo dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang rgya che bas ri nag po/
[}]thams cad zil gyis gnon par mngon par lhag ger 'dug go/ wa mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing phan gdags pa'i sems ngal ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos
yongs su radzin pa'i ng 'di ltar rgyas pa dang/ rgya chen por gyur pas/ theg pa chen po pa thag pa la gsar du zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba rnams kyi dag pa'i chos thams cad zilagyis
gnon na/ gzhan dag gi ni sos te/ lha mo de bas na sems can rnams dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba nyid yang rag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya/
yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ yang dag pa rab tu dga' bar bya 1 gzud par bya/ dgod par bya/ lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar don cha'o// de ltar 'bros
bu che'o// de ltar phan yon che'o// lha mo gal te bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du zin kyang/ lha mo
dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzan pa'i yon tan dang phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mtha' 'am/ mu thug par ma 'gyur ro// lha mo ram pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas
la dang ldan no// lha mo dam pa chos yongs su gzung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa ngas ma bstan pa da khyod kyis bshad par stobs par gyis shig/ de nas lha mo dpal 'phreng
dgis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul pa mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das dam pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba de ni thog pa chen por ga zla dgas lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang/ 'jig
rtan pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad ni thag pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na klung chen po bzhi ni mtsho ma dros pa las 'byung ngo//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dag pa'i chos thams cad kyang theg pa chen po las
'byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das dparan sa bon gyi rnam pa gang ri lags pa dag dang/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ san dang/ nags tshal de dag thams cad ni sa skyen po la brten
rung sa na po la gnas te/ skye zhing 'phel rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag dang/
'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das ba'i dag pa'i chos gang lags pa thams cad dang/ de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la brtan cing/ theg pa chen po la gnas te/
sku zhing 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas theg pa chen po la gnas shing/ theg pa chen de yongs su bzung na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
kyi thig pa thams cad dad 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dag pa'i chos thams cad kyang rten cing gnas te/ yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang/ dam pa'i chos nub pa dang/ so sor thar pa dang/ 'dul ba dang/ rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnas drug pa/
'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan ning btags pa gang lags pa'i gnas drug po de dag kyang thag pa chen po'i dgongs pa las byung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di na theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i
chos gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom
ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das so sor thar pa dang 'dul pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di gnyis ni don gcig ste/
yi ge'i 'bru ni tha dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi bslab pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slar du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/'di
[ ]ltar 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang/ rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi bar btags pa 'din theg pa chen po'i tshog 'i tshul khrims kyi lung pa lags so// bcom ldan
'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba dang/ bstan par rdzogs pa ma mchis so// de nuro slad du zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu 'byung
ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs bzhi me mchis kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'byung zhing/ bsnyen por
( rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams pa dang/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la skyabs su mchi ba lags te//
bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang
rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'du byed thams cad la ma zad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dpar na gshed mas ral gri gzas
ba bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ de dag kyang nges par byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabs su gyur pa ni
skabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can skabs ma mas pa rnams gang dang gang gis 'jigs skag pa'i 'jigag stag pa de dang de
las 'byung ba'i rtsol ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das ragra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la'ang 'jigs pa de mchis ta/ 'jigs pa das skrag pas dgra bcom
pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar khas len pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas
rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas/
pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi skya pa bas pa'i ng ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bsten par bgyi ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ des na de dag ni dag pa
ma lags/ las mthar phyin pa ma lags te/ de dag gi bgyi ba mang lags so// de dag gas spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/de dag
ma sbyangs pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs dang rir pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes
bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
rtswa skya ngan las 'das pa bar s pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma
lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni da bzhin gshags pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa bar s pas yon tan bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan pa lags la/
bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su
[p/ ]mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ da ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa band khas spang bar bgyi ba'i skyon thams cad sangs shing/ mchog tu yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan
'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams ni skyon gyi lhag ma rnams dang bcas pa yongs su ma dag pa'i chos can lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su
mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa bar s pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ dgra bcom pa rnams dar darang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya
ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings dang ring cha lags so// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la so sor rtog pa'i yashes
kyi mthar dbugs phyin pa rjes su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang/ lhag ma dang bcas pa dang/ drang pa'i don dang/
gru@#/ rnam par phye ste lung bstan par brgya pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'gyi 'pho ni 'di gnyis lags te/gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyun
chad pa'i 'ari bo dang/ yongs su bsdus pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i ra 'tholags so// bcom ldan 'das de la rgyun chad par 'tsho na tong mtshams sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i
